18.verse: Pamene anthu ankamva mabingu ndi kuona ziphaliwali ndi kumvanso lipenga ndi kuona utsi umene umafuka mʼphiri, ananjenjemera ndi mantha. Ndipo iwo anayima patali.

19.verse: Ndipo anati kwa Mose, “Iwe utiyankhule ndipo tidzamvera. Koma usalole kuti Mulungu atiyankhule, tingafe.”

20.verse: Koma Mose anati kwa anthuwo, “Musachite mantha. Mulungu wabwera kudzakuyesani kuti mukhale ndi mtima woopa Mulungu kuti musamuchimwire.”

21.verse: Anthu aja anayima patali koma Mose anayandikira mtambo wakuda kumene kunali Mulungu.

22.verse: Za Mafano ndi Maguwa Ansembe - Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Awuze izi Aisraeli: ‘Inu mwaona nokha kuti Ine ndakuyankhulani kuchokera kumwamba.

23.verse: Choncho musadzipangire milungu yasiliva kapena yagolide kuti muziyipembedza pamodzi ndi Ine.’ ”

24.verse: Mundimangire guwa ladothi ndipo muziperekapo nsembe zopsereza ndi nsembe zachiyanjano, nkhosa, mbuzi ndi ngʼombe zanu. Pamalo paliponse pamene Ine ndidzakonza kuti muzinditamandirapo, ndidzabwera ndi kukudalitsani.

25.verse: Ngati mudzandimangira guwa lansembe lamiyala, musagwiritse ntchito miyala yosema, pakuti mudzalidetsa mukadzagwiritsa ntchito zida.

26.verse: Musamakwere pa makwerero popita pa guwa langa lansembe kuti mungaonetse maliseche anu.

1.verse: “Uwawuze Aisraeli malamulo awa:

2.verse: Antchito a Chihebri - “Mukagula kapolo wa Chihebri, azikugwirirani ntchito zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi. Koma mʼchaka cha chisanu ndi chiwiri muzimumasula, ndipo asalipire kanthu.

3.verse: Ngati anabwera yekha, amasulidwenso yekha. Koma ngati anali ndi mkazi pamene ankabwera, mkaziyo apite nayenso.

4.verse: Ngati bwana wake amupatsa mkazi ndipo mkaziyo anabereka ana aamuna kapena aakazi, mkazi ndi anawo adzakhala a bwanayo ndipo mwamuna yekhayo ndiye adzamasulidwe.

5.verse: “Koma ngati kapoloyo alengeza kuti, ‘Ine sindikufuna kumasulidwa chifukwa ndimakonda mbuye wanga, mkazi wanga ndi ana,’

6.verse: mbuye wakeyo abwere naye kwa Yehova. Abwere naye pa chitseko kapena pa mphuthu zachitseko ndipo abowole khutu lake ndi chitsulo. Ndipo iye adzakhala kapolo wake moyo wake wonse.

7.verse: “Ngati munthu agulitsa mwana wake wamkazi kukhala mdzakazi, mwanayo asamasulidwe monga achitira ndi akapolo aamuna.

8.verse: Koma ngati mkaziyo sakukondweretsa bwana wake amene wamusankha kuti amukwatire, amulole kuti awomboledwe. Bwanayo alibe mphamvu zomugulitsa kwa anthu achilendo, chifukwa iyeyo waphwanya pangano lake lomukwatira iye.

9.verse: Ngati anamusankha kuti akhale mkazi wa mwana wake, ayenera kumusunga ngati mwana wake wamkazi.

10.verse: Ngati akwatira mkazi wina, asamumane woyambayo chakudya ngakhale chovala ndipo apiritirize kugona naye ngati mkazi wake.

11.verse: Koma ngati sangathe kumuchitira zonsezi, ndiye amuleke apite popanda kulipira kanthu.

12.verse: Munthu Akapwetekedwa - “Munthu aliyense amene amenya mnzake namupha, iyenso ayenera kuphedwa.

13.verse: Koma ngati sanachite dala, ndipo Mulungu analola kuti zichitike, iyeyo athawire ku malo kumene ndidzakupatsani.

14.verse: Koma ngati munthu akonza chiwembu ndi kupha mnzake mwadala, ameneyo muchotseni ngakhale ku guwa langa lansembe ndipo aphedwe.

15.verse: “Munthu aliyense amene amenya abambo ake kapena mayi ake ayenera kuphedwa.

16.verse: “Munthu aliyense amene aba munthu mnzake, ndi kukamugulitsa, kapena kumangomusunga, ayenera kuphedwa.

17.verse: “Aliyense amene atemberera abambo ake kapena amayi ake ayenera kuphedwa.

18.verse: “Ngati anthu awiri akangana ndipo wina amenya mnzake ndi mwala kapena nkhonya koma wosamupha, womenyedwayo akadwala nagona pa bedi,

19.verse: kenaka nachira ndi kuyamba kuyenda ndi ndodo kutuluka kunja kwa nyumba yake, ndiye kuti womenya mnzakeyo sadzayimbidwa mlandu. Komabe adzayenera kulipira womenyedwayo chifukwa cha nthawi imene anagona pa bedi ija, ndiponso ayenera kumusala mpaka atachiritsitsa.

20.verse: “Ngati munthu amenya kapolo wake wamwamuna kapena mdzakazi ndi ndodo, kapolo uja ndikufa chifukwa cha kumenyedwako, munthuyo ayenera kulangidwa.

21.verse: Koma ngati kapolo uja akhala ndi moyo tsiku lonse kapena masiku awiri, ndiye kuti mbuye uja asalangidwe chifukwa kapolo ndi chuma chake.

22.verse: “Ngati anthu akumenyana ndi kupweteka mayi woyembekezera, mayiyo napita padera, koma osavulala, wolakwayo ayenera kulipira chilichonse chimene mwamuna wake wa mkaziyo adzalamula ndipo bwalo lamilandu lavomereza.

23.verse: Koma ngati wavulazidwa kwambiri, ndiye malipiro ake adzakhala motere: moyo kulipa moyo,

24.verse: diso kulipira diso, dzino kulipira dzino, mkono kulipa mkono, phazi kulipa phazi.

25.verse: Kutentha ndi moto kulipa kutentha ndi moto, bala kulipa bala, mkwingwirima kulipa mkwingwirima.

26.verse: “Ngati munthu amenya wantchito wake wa mwamuna kapena mdzakazi wake pa diso ndi kuliwononga, wantchitoyo amasulidwe ngati malipiro a diso lake.

27.verse: Ndipo ngati agulula dzino la wantchito wamwamuna kapena mdzakazi, wantchitoyo amasulidwe ngati malipiro a dzino lake.

28.verse: “Ngati ngʼombe ipha munthu wamwamuna kapena wamkazi ndi nyanga yake, iponyedwe miyala ndipo nyama yake isadyedwe. Ndipo mwini ngʼombeyo asayimbidwe mlandu.

29.verse: Koma ngati ngʼombeyo inali ndi chizolowezi chogunda anthu ndipo mwini wakeyo anachenjezedwa koma iye sanayimange ndipo yapha mwamuna kapena mkazi, ngʼombeyo iponyedwe miyala ndipo mwini wakeyo aphedwenso.

30.verse: Koma ngati wauzidwa kuti alipire, iye apereke zimene wauzidwazo kuti awombole moyo wake.

31.verse: Lamulo ili ligwirenso ntchito ngati ngʼombeyo yagunda mwana wamwamuna kapena wamkazi.

32.verse: Ngati ngʼombeyo yagunda kapolo wamwamuna kapena mdzakazi, mwini ngʼombeyo apereke masekeli makumi atatu a siliva kwa mwini kapoloyo, ndipo ngʼombeyo iponyedwe miyala.

33.verse: “Munthu akasiya dzenje lapululu kapena akakumba dzenje koma wosaphimbapo, ndipo ngʼombe kapena bulu nʼkugweramo,

34.verse: mwini dzenjelo amulipire mwini chiweto chakufacho koma iye atenge chiwetocho.

35.verse: “Ngati ngʼombe ya munthu wina ipha ngʼombe ya mnzake, ngʼombe yamoyo ija igulitsidwe ndipo anthu awiriwo agawane pakati ndalama yake. Achite chimodzimodzi ndi ngʼombe yakufa ija.

36.verse: Koma zikadziwika kuti ngʼombeyo inali ndi khalidwe logunda, ndipo mwini wake samayitsekera mʼkhola, mwini ngʼombeyo alipire ngʼombe ina yamoyo koma atenge yakufayo.”

1.verse: Za Kuteteza Katundu - “Ngati munthu aba ngʼombe kapena nkhosa ndi kuyipha kapena kuyigulitsa, iye abweze ngʼombe zisanu pa ngʼombe imodzi ndi nkhosa zinayi pa nkhosa imodzi.

2.verse: “Ngati mbala ipezeka ikuthyola nyumba ndipo imenyedwa nʼkufa, amene wapha mbalayo sanalakwe.

3.verse: Koma akayipha dzuwa litatuluka, woyiphayo ali ndi mlandu wakupha. “Mbala iyenera kubweza ndithu koma ngati ilibe kalikonse igulitsidwe, kulipira zomwe yabazo.

4.verse: “Ngati chiweto chobedwacho chipezeka chamoyo mʼmanja mwake, kaya ndi ngʼombe kapena bulu kapena nkhosa, mbalayo ibwezere ziweto ziwiri pa chiweto chobedwacho.

5.verse: “Ngati munthu alekerera ziweto zake kukalowa mʼmunda wa munthu wina kukadya mbewu zake, munthuyo amubwezere mwini mundawo mbewu zina zabwino kapena mpesa wina wabwino kwambiri.

6.verse: “Ngati munthu ayatsa moto, motowo ndikukafika mpaka ku munda ndi kuwotcha mulu wa tirigu kapena tirigu wosadula, kapena munda wonse, ndiye kuti munthu amene anayatsa motoyo alipire.

7.verse: “Ngati munthu asungitsidwa ndi mnzake ndalama kapena katundu, ndipo zinthu zija nʼkubedwa mʼnyumba mwake, wakubayo ngati agwidwa, ayenera kubwezera kawiri chobedwacho.

8.verse: Koma ngati mbalayo sipezeka, mwini nyumbayo ayenera kukaonekera ku bwalo lamilandu kuti akamve ngati anaba katundu wa mnzakeyo.

9.verse: Ngati pali kukangana kokhudza ngʼombe, bulu, nkhosa, zovala kapena kanthu kalikonse kotayika, ndipo mmodzi ndikunena kuti chinthucho nʼchake, awiriwo abwere nawo mlandu wawowo pamaso pa Mulungu ndipo amene mlandu umugomere adzayenera kumulipira mnzakeyo kawiri.

10.verse: “Ngati munthu wina anasungitsa mnzake bulu, ngʼombe, nkhosa, kapena chiweto chilichonse ndipo chiweto chija nʼkufa kapena kupweteka kapena kutengedwa popanda wina kuona,

11.verse: ndiye kuti anthu awiriwo ayenera kulumbira pamaso pa Mulungu kuti asatenge chinthu cha mnzake. Zikatero mwini katundu uja avomereze zimenezi ndipo asabwezeredwe kanthu.

12.verse: Koma ngati chiwetocho chinabedwa, iye ayenera kubwezera mwini wakeyo.

13.verse: Ngati chinagwidwa ndi zirombo, iye ayenera kubweretsa zotsalira ngati umboni ndipo sadzalipira kanthu.

14.verse: “Ngati munthu abwereka chiweto cha mnzake ndipo chiweto chija nʼkuvulala kapena kufa chikanali ndi iyebe, wobwerekayo ayenera kulipira.

15.verse: Koma ngati mwini wakeyo ali ndi chiwetocho, wobwerekayo sadzalipira. Ngati anapereka ndalama pobwereka chiwetocho, ndalama anaperekazo zilowa mʼmalo mwa chiweto chakufacho.

16.verse: Malamulo a Kakhalidwe ka Anthu - “Ngati munthu anyenga namwali wosadziwa mwamuna amene sanapalidwe ubwenzi ndi kugona naye, munthuyo ayenera kulipira malowolo ndipo adzakhala mkazi wake.

17.verse: Ngati abambo ake akanitsitsa kwamtuwagalu kumupereka kuti amukwatire, munthuyo aperekebe malowolo woyenera namwaliyo.

18.verse: “Musayilole mfiti yayikazi kuti ikhale ndi moyo.

19.verse: “Aliyense wogonana ndi chiweto ayenera kuphedwa.

20.verse: “Aliyense wopereka nsembe kwa mulungu wina osati Yehova awonongedwe.

21.verse: “Musazunze mlendo kapena kumuchitira nkhanza, pakuti inu munali alendo mʼdziko la Igupto.

22.verse: “Musazunze mkazi wamasiye kapena mwana wamasiye.

23.verse: Ngati muwazunza ndipo iwo nʼkulirira kwa Ine, ndidzamva kulira kwawo.

24.verse: Ine ndidzakukwiyirani ndipo ndidzakuphani ndi lupanga. Akazi anu adzakhala amasiye ndiponso ana anu adzakhala wopanda abambo.

25.verse: “Ngati mukongoza ndalama kwa mʼbale wanu amene ndi mʼmphawi pakati panu, musadzamuchite monga zimene amachita wokongoza ndalama. Musadzamuyikire chiwongoladzanja.

26.verse: Mukatenga chovala cha mnzanu kuti chikhale chikole mumubwezere dzuwa lisanalowe

27.verse: chifukwa chovala chimene amadzifundira nacho nʼchomwecho. Nanga usiku adzafunda chiyani? Tsonotu ngati adzandilirira, Ine ndidzamva pakuti ndine wachifundo.

28.verse: “Musachite chipongwe Mulungu wanu kapena kutemberera mtsogoleri wa anthu anu.

29.verse: “Musachedwe kupereka kwa Ine zokolola zanu zochuluka ndi vinyo wanu wochuluka. “Mundipatse ana anu achisamba aamuna.

30.verse: Muchite chimodzimodzi ndi ngʼombe zanu ndi nkhosa zanu. Mwana woyamba kubadwa azikhala ndi amayi ake masiku asanu ndi awiri. Koma pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chitatu mwanayo muzimupereka kwa Ine.

31.verse: “Inu mukhale anthu anga opatulika. Choncho musadye nyama ya chiweto chimene chaphedwa ndi zirombo. Nyamayo muwaponyere agalu.”

1.verse: Malamulo a Zachilungamo ndi Zachifundo - “Usafalitse mbiri yabodza. Usathandize munthu wolakwa pomuchitira umboni wonama.

2.verse: “Usatsate gulu la anthu ndi kuchita choyipa. Pamene ukupereka umboni mʼbwalo lamilandu, usakhotetse mlandu chifukwa chofuna kukondweretsa anthu ambiri.

3.verse: Ndipo poweruza mlandu wa munthu wosauka usamukondere.

4.verse: “Ngati ukumana ndi ngʼombe kapena bulu wa mdani wako zitasochera, uwonetsetse kuti wazitenga kupita nazo kwa mwini wakeyo.

5.verse: Ngati uwona bulu wa munthu wina amene amakuda atagwa ndi katundu, usamusiye pomwepo, uwonetsetse kuti wamuthandiza.

6.verse: “Usakhotetse milandu ya anthu osauka.

7.verse: Upewe zabodza ndipo usaphetse munthu wosalakwa ndi wolungama, chifukwa Ine sindidzakhululukira wochimwa.

8.verse: “Musamalandire chiphuphu, pakuti chiphuphu chimadetsa mʼmaso anthu oweruza ndi kusintha mawu awo kuti mlandu uyipire osalakwa.

9.verse: “Usamuzunze mlendo, pakuti inu nomwe mukudziwa mmene amamvera mlendo chifukwa nanunso munali alendo mʼdziko la Igupto.

10.verse: Malamulo a Nthawi Zopuma - “Muzidzala mbewu zanu mʼmunda ndi kumakolola mbewuzo kwa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi.

11.verse: Koma chaka chachisanu ndi chiwiri muzisiya osalima mindayo kuti anthu osauka pakati panu azipezamo chakudya, ndipo nyama zakuthengo zizidya zotsalazo. Muzichita chimodzimodzi ndi minda ya mpesa ndi mitengo ya olivi.

12.verse: “Muzigwira ntchito masiku asanu ndi limodzi koma tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri musagwire ntchito kuti ngʼombe yanu ndi bulu wanu apume ndiponso kuti kapolo wobadwira mʼnyumba yanu ndi mlendo yemwe apezenso mphamvu.

13.verse: “Samalani pochita zonse zimene ine ndanena. Musamapemphere kwa milungu ina ndipo mayina awo musamawatchule.

14.verse: Masiku Atatu Akulu a Chikondwerero - “Muzichita zikondwerero zolemekeza Ine katatu pa chaka.

15.verse: “Muzichita Chikondwerero cha Buledi wopanda Yisiti. Kwa masiku asanu ndi awiri muzidya buledi wopanda yisiti monga ndinakulamulirani. Muzichita zimenezi mwezi wa Abibu pa nthawi yomwe ndayika, pakuti mʼmwezi umenewu munatuluka mʼdziko la Igupto. “Pasapezeke munthu wobwera pamaso panga wopanda kanthu mʼmanja.

16.verse: “Muzichita Chikondwerero cha Masika pogwiritsa ntchito zipatso zoyambirira kucha zimene munadzala mʼmunda. “Muzichitanso Chikondwerero cha Zokolola pakutha pa chaka, pamene mukututa zokolola zanu mʼmunda.

17.verse: “Amuna onse azionekera pamaso pa Ambuye Yehova katatu pa chaka.

18.verse: “Musapereke magazi anyama ngati nsembe kwa Ine pamodzi ndi chilichonse chimene chili ndi yisiti. “Ndipo musasunge mafuta anyama yansembe ya pa chikondwerero mpaka mmawa.

19.verse: “Muzibwera ndi zipatso zoyambirira kucha zabwino kwambiri ku Nyumba ya Yehova Mulungu wanu. “Musamaphike kamwana kambuzi mu mkaka wa mayi wake.

20.verse: Kutsogolera kwa Mngelo wa Mulungu - “Taona Ine ndikutuma mngelo wanga patsogolo panu kuti akutetezeni mʼnjiramo ndi kukakufikitsani ku malo amene ndakonza.

21.verse: Muzimumvera ndi kumvetsetsa zimene akunena. Musamuwukire chifukwa sadzakhululuka kuwukira kwanu, pakuti akuchita zimenezi mʼdzina langa.

22.verse: Ngati mudzamvera iyeyu ndi kuchita zonse zimene Ine ndikunena, Ine ndidzakhala mdani wa adani anu ndipo ndidzatsutsana ndi onse otsutsana nanu.

23.verse: Mngelo wanga adzakhala patsogolo panu ndipo adzakufikitsani mʼdziko la Aamori, Ahiti, Aperezi, Akanaani, Ahivi ndi Ayebusi, ndipo ndidzawapheratu onsewo.

24.verse: Musagwadire milungu yawo kapena kuyipembedza. Ndipo musatsatire zinthu zomwe amachita. Koma inu mukawononge milungu yawo ndi kuphwasula malo amene amapembedzerapo.

25.verse: Muzipembedza Yehova Mulungu wanu ndipo adzakudalitsani ndi chakudya ndi madzi ndiponso ndidzachotsa nthenda pakati panu.

26.verse: Palibe mkazi amene adzapite padera kapena kukhala wosabereka mʼdziko mwanu. Ndidzakupatsani moyo wautali.

27.verse: “Ine ndidzawachititsa mantha ndi kusokoneza anthu onse amene adzalimbana ndi inu ndipo adani anu onse adzakuthawani.

28.verse: Ahivi, Akanaani ndi Ahiti adzathawa ngati kuti ndawatumizira mavu.

29.verse: Komabe sindidzawachotseratu onse mʼchaka chimodzi chifukwa dziko lingadzakhale lopanda anthu ndipo nyama zakuthengo zidzakuchulukirani.

30.verse: Ndidzawathamangitsa pangʼonopangʼono mpaka inu mutachuluka kokwanira mwakuti nʼkutenga dzikolo.

31.verse: “Malire a dziko lanu adzakhala kuyambira ku Nyanja Yofiira mpaka ku nyanja ya Afilisti, ndiponso kuyambira ku chipululu mpaka ku mtsinje wa Yufurate. Anthu onse okhala mʼdziko limeneli ndidzawapereka mʼmanja mwanu ndipo mudzawathamangitsa.

32.verse: Musachite pangano ndi iwo kapena ndi milungu yawo.

33.verse: Asadzakhale mʼdziko lanu chifukwa angadzakuchimwitseni ndi kuyamba kupembedza milungu yawo. Mukadzatero ndiye kuti mwakodwa mu msampha.”

1.verse: Kutsimikizira kwa Pangano - Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Bwera ku phiri kuno kwa Yehova, iwe pamodzi ndi Aaroni, Nadabu, Abihu ndi akuluakulu a Israeli makumi asanu ndi awiri. Enanu mundipembedze muli chapatali.

2.verse: Koma Mose yekha ayandikire Yehova, ndipo enawo asayandikire. Komanso anthu ena onse asakwere nawe ku phiri kuno.”

3.verse: Tsono Mose anapita kukawuza anthu mawu onse a Yehova ndi malamulo onse, ndipo anthu onse anayankha mogwirizana kuti, “Tidzachita zonse zimene Yehova wanena.”

4.verse: Ndipo Mose analemba zonse zimene Yehova ananena. Mmawa mwake Mose anadzuka nayamba kumanga guwa lansembe mʼmunsi mwa phirilo ndipo anayimika miyala khumi ndi iwiri ngati zipilala kuyimira mafuko khumi ndi awiri a Israeli.

5.verse: Kenaka Mose anatuma Aisraeli achinyamata kuti aphe ndi kukapereka kwa Yehova nsembe zopsereza zachiyanjano.

6.verse: Mose anatenga theka la magazi ndi kuyika mʼmbale, ndipo theka linalo analiwaza pa guwa lansembe.

7.verse: Anatenganso Buku la Chipangano ndi kuwerengera anthu. Anthuwo anayankha kuti, “Zonse zimene Yehova wanena tamva, ndipo tidzazichita.”

8.verse: Kenaka Mose anatenga magazi, nawaza anthuwo ndipo anati, “Awa ndi magazi a pangano limene Yehova wapanga ndi inu molingana ndi mawu ake onsewa.”

9.verse: Kenaka Mose pamodzi ndi Aaroni, Nadabu, Abihu ndi akuluakulu makumi asanu ndi awiri a Israeli aja anakwera ku phiri,

10.verse: ndipo anaona Mulungu wa Israeli. Pansi pa mapazi ake panali njira yoyendamo yopangidwa ndi mwala wa safiro woyalidwa bwino wa maonekedwe owala ngati thambo.

11.verse: Ngakhale anaona Yehova koma sanafe, mʼmalo mwake anadya ndi kumwa.

12.verse: Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Bwera kwa ine ku phiri kuno, ndipo udikire konkuno. Ndidzakupatsa miyala imene ndalembapo malemba kuti ndiwaphunzitse.”

13.verse: Ndipo anayamba ulendo wopita ku phiri la Mulungu pamodzi ndi womuthandiza wake Yoswa.

14.verse: Apa nʼkuti Mose atawawuza akuluakulu aja kuti, “Mudikire pano mpaka titabweranso. Aaroni ndi Huri ali nanu, aliyense amene ali ndi milandu apite kwa iwo.”

15.verse: Mose atakwera ku phiri kuja mtambo unaphimba phirilo.

16.verse: Ulemerero wa Yehova unakhala pa phiri la Sinai, ndipo mtambo unaphimba phirilo kwa masiku asanu ndi limodzi. Pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri Yehova anayitana Mose kuchokera mu mtambowo.

17.verse: Ulemerero wa Yehova uja unkaoneka ngati malawi a moto pamwamba pa phirilo.

18.verse: Ndipo Mose analowa mʼmitambo nakwera phiri. Iye anakhala ku phiriko 40 usana ndi usiku.

1.verse: Zopereka Zomangira Chihema - Yehova ananena kwa Mose kuti,

2.verse: “Uza Aisraeli kuti abweretse chopereka kwa Ine. Iwe ulandire choperekacho mʼmalo mwanga kuchokera kwa munthu amene akupereka mwakufuna kwake.

3.verse: Zopereka zimene ulandire kwa anthuwo ndi izi: Golide, siliva ndi mkuwa.

4.verse: Nsalu zobiriwira, zapepo, zofiira, nsalu zofewa, ubweya wambuzi;

5.verse: zikopa za nkhosa zazimuna za utoto wofiira ndi zikopa za akatumbu; matabwa amtengo wa mkesha;

6.verse: mafuta anyale a olivi, zonunkhiritsa mafuta odzozera ndi zopangira lubani wonunkhira;

7.verse: miyala yokongola ya mtundu wa onikisi ndi ina yabwino yoyika pa efodi ndi pa chovala cha pachifuwa.

8.verse: “Iwo andipangire malo wopatulika, ndipo Ine ndidzakhala pakati pawo.

9.verse: Umange chihema ndiponso ziwiya zamʼkatimo monga momwe Ine ndidzakuonetsere.

10.verse: Bokosi la Chipangano - “Tsono apange bokosi lamatabwa amtengo wa mkesha, ndipo kutalika kwake kukhale masentimita 114, mulifupi mwake masentimita 69, msinkhu wake masentimita 69.

11.verse: Bokosilo ulikute ndi golide wabwino kwambiri, mʼkati mwake ndi kunja komwe, ndipo upange mkombero wagolide kuzungulira bokosilo.

12.verse: Upange mphete zinayi zagolide ndipo uzimangirire ku miyendo yake inayi ya bokosilo, mbali ina ziwiri ndi mbali inanso ziwiri.

13.verse: Kenaka upange mizati yamtengo wa mkesha ndi kuzikuta ndi golide.

14.verse: Ndipo ulowetse nsichizo mʼmphete zija za mbali zonse ziwiri za bokosilo kuti azinyamulira.

15.verse: Nsichizo zizikhala mʼmphete za bokosilo nthawi zonse, zisamachotsedwe.

16.verse: Ndipo udzayike mʼbokosilo miyala iwiri yolembedwapo malamulo imene Ine ndidzakupatse.

17.verse: “Upange chivundikiro cha bokosilo cha golide wabwino kwambiri, kutalika kwake masentimita 114, mulifupi mwake masentimita 69.

18.verse: Ndipo upange Akerubi awiri agolide osula ndi nyundo, uwayike mbali ziwiri za chivundikirocho,

19.verse: kerubi mmodzi mbali ina ndi wina mbali inayo. Akerubiwa uwapangire limodzi ndi chivundikirocho mʼmapeto mwa mbali ziwirizo.

20.verse: Mapiko a Akerubiwo adzatambasukire pamwamba pa chivundikiro cha bokosilo kuti achiphimbe. Akerubiwo adzakhale choyangʼanana, aliyense kuyangʼana chivundikirocho.

21.verse: Uyike chivundikirocho pamwamba pa bokosi ndipo mʼbokosilo uyikemo miyala ya malamulo, imene ndidzakupatse.

22.verse: Ndizidzakumana nawe pamenepo, pamwamba pa chivundikiro cha bokosilo, pakati pa Akerubi awiriwo, ndikumadzakupatsa malamulo onse okhudzana ndi Aisraeli.

23.verse: Tebulo la Buledi Woperekedwa kwa Mulungu - “Upange tebulo la matabwa amtengo wa mkesha, mulitali mwake masentimita 91, mulifupi mwake masentimita 46, msinkhu wake masentimita 69.

24.verse: Tebulolo ulikute ndi golide wabwino kwambiri ndipo upange mkombero wagolide mʼmbali mwake.

25.verse: Upange feremu yozungulira tebulo, mulifupi mwake ngati chikhatho cha dzanja, ndipo uyike mkombero wagolide kuzungulira feremuyo.

26.verse: Upange mphete zinayi zagolide, ndipo uzilumikize ku ngodya zake zinayi, kumene kuli miyendo yake inayi.

27.verse: Mphetezo uziyike kufupi ndi feremu kuti azikolowekamo nsichi zonyamulira tebuloyo.

28.verse: Upange nsichi zamtengo wa mkesha ndi kuzikuta ndi golide kuti azinyamulira tebulolo.

29.verse: Upange mbale ndi zipande zagolide wabwino, pamodzinso ndi mitsuko ndi mabeseni zogwiritsa ntchito popereka nsembe.

30.verse: Pa tebulopo uyikepo buledi woperekedwa kosalekeza, kuti azikhala pamaso panga nthawi zonse.

31.verse: Choyikapo Nyale - “Upange choyikapo nyale chagolide wabwino kwambiri. Tsinde lake ndi mphanda zake zikhale zosulidwa ndi nyundo. Zikho zake zokhala ndi mphukira ndi maluwa ake zipangidwire kumodzi.

32.verse: Mʼmbali mwake mukhale mphanda zisanu ndi imodzi, zitatu mbali iliyonse.

33.verse: Zikho zitatu zokhala ngati za maluwa amtowo, mphukira ndi duwa zikhale pa mphanda yoyamba. Pa mphanda yachiwiri pakhalenso zikho zitatu zokhala ngati za maluwa amtowo, mphukira ndi duwa. Ndipo mphanda zonse zisanu ndi imodzi zikhale chimodzimodzi ndipo zituluke mʼchoyikapo nyalecho.

34.verse: Pa choyikapo nyalecho pakhale zikho zinayi zopangidwa ngati maluwa amtowo ali ndi mphukira ndi maluwa.

35.verse: Mphukira yoyamba ikhale mʼmunsi mwa nthambi ziwiri zoyamba za pa choyikapo nyale. Mphukira yachiwiri ikhale mʼmunsi mwa nthambi ziwiri zinazo. Ndipo mphukira yachitatu ikhale mʼmunsi mwa nthambi zina ziwirinso. Zonse pamodzi zikhale nthambi zisanu ndi imodzi

36.verse: Mphukira ndi nthambi zonse zisulidwe kumodzi ndi choyikapo nyalecho ndi golide wabwino kwambiri.

37.verse: “Ndipo upange nyale zisanu ndi ziwiri ndi kuziyika pa choyikapo nyalecho kuti ziwunikire kutsogolo.

38.verse: Mbaniro ndi zowolera phulusa zikhale zagolide wabwino kwambiri.

39.verse: Choyikapo nyale ndi zipangizo zonse zipangidwe ndi golide wabwino kwambiri wolemera makilogalamu 34.

40.verse: Uwonetsetse kuti wapanga zonse monga momwe ndikukuonetsera pa phiri pano.”

1.verse: Chihema cha Mapemphero - “Panga chihema pogwiritsa ntchito nsalu khumi zofewa, zosalala ndi zolukidwa bwino, zobiriwira, zapepo ndi zofiira. Ndipo anthu aluso apete pa nsaluzo Akerubi.

2.verse: Nsalu zonse zikhale zofanana. Mulitali mwake zikhale mamita khumi ndi atatu, mulifupi mamita awiri.

3.verse: Ulumikize nsalu zisanu kuti ikhale nsalu imodzi. Uchite chimodzimodzi ndi nsalu zisanu zinazo.

4.verse: Panga zokolowekamo za nsalu yobiriwira mʼmphepete mwa nsalu imodzi yotsiriza ya mbali ina. Uchitenso chimodzimodzi ndi nsalu yotsiriza ya mbali inayo.

5.verse: Upange zokolowekamo 50 pa nsalu yoyamba ndi zokolowekamo makumi asanu zinanso pa nsalu inayo. Upange motero kuti zokolowekamozo ziziyangʼanana.

6.verse: Kenaka upange ngowe zagolide makumi asanu zolumikizira nsalu ziwirizo kuti zipange chihema chimodzi.

7.verse: “Upange nsalu za ubweya wambuzi zophimba pamwamba pa chihemacho. Nsalu zonse pamodzi zikhale khumi ndi imodzi.

8.verse: Nsalu zonse khumi ndi imodzi zikhale zofanana. Mulitali mwake mukhale mamita khumi ndi anayi ndipo mulifupi mwake mukhale mamita awiri.

9.verse: Ulumikize nsalu zisanu kuti ikhale nsalu imodzi ndipo zina zisanu ndi imodzi uzilumikizenso kuti ikhale nsalu imodzinso. Nsalu yachisanu ndi chimodzi imene ili kutsogolo kwa tenti uyipinde pawiri.

10.verse: Upange zokolowekamo 50 mʼmphepete mwa nsalu imodzi yotsirizira ya nsalu yoyamba yolumikiza ija. Upangenso zokolowekamo zina 50 mʼmphepete mwa nsalu yotsirizira ya nsalu inanso yolumikiza ija.

11.verse: Kenaka upange ngowe 50 zamkuwa ndipo uzilowetse mu zokolowekazo. Ndiye uphatikize nsalu ziwirizo kuti tentiyo ikhale imodzi.

12.verse: Theka lotsalira la nsaluyo lidzalendewera kumbuyo kwa chihemacho.

13.verse: Nsalu yotsalira ya masentimita 46 mulitali mwake mʼmbali zonse ziwiri idzalendewere kuphimba mbali ziwirizo.

14.verse: Upange chikopa cha nkhosa zazimuna cha utoto wofiira chophimbira tentiyo ndipo pamwamba pake upangireponso chophimbira china cha zikopa za akatumbu.

15.verse: “Upange maferemu amatabwa amtengo wa mkesha oyimikira chihemacho.

16.verse: Feremu iliyonse ikhale yotalika mamita anayi ndipo mulifupi mwake mukhale masentimita 69.

17.verse: Thabwa lililonse likhale ndi zolumikizira ziwiri. Upange maferemu onse a chihemacho ndi matabwa otere.

18.verse: Upange maferemu makumi awiri a mbali yakummwera kwa chihemacho.

19.verse: Ndipo upange matsinde 40 asiliva ndipo uwayike pansi pa maferemuwo. Pansi pa feremu iliyonse pakhale matsinde awiri ogwiriziza zolumikizira ziwiri zija.

20.verse: Ndipo mbali yakumpoto ya chihemacho upangenso maferemu makumi awiri.

21.verse: Upangenso matsinde 40 asiliva, awiri pansi pa feremu iliyonse.

22.verse: Upange maferemu asanu ndi imodzi a kumbuyo kwa tenti, kumbali yakumadzulo.

23.verse: Ndipo upangenso maferemu awiri a pa ngodya yakumbuyo kwenikweni kwa tenti.

24.verse: Pa ngodya ziwirizi pakhale maferemu awiri, kuyambira pansi mpaka pamwamba ndipo alumikizidwe pa ngowe imodzi. Maferemu onse akhale ofanana.

25.verse: Choncho pakhale maferemu asanu ndi atatu ndiponso matsinde 16 asiliva, awiri akhale pansi pa feremu iliyonse.

26.verse: “Upange mitanda ya matabwa amtengo wa mkesha: mitanda isanu ikhale ya maferemu a mbali imodzi ya chihema,

27.verse: mitanda isanu inanso ikhale ya maferemu a mbali inayo. Pakhalenso mitanda ina isanu ya mbali yakumadzulo, kumapeto kwenikweni kwa chihema.

28.verse: Mtanda wapakati pa maferemuwo uchokere pa maferemu a mbali ina mpaka mbali inanso.

29.verse: Maferemuwo uwakute ndi golide ndiponso upange mphete zagolide zogwiriziza mitandayo. Ndipo mitandayonso uyikute ndi golide.

30.verse: “Upange chihema mofanana ndi momwe ndinakuonetsera pa phiri paja.

31.verse: “Upange nsalu yokhala ndi mtundu wamtambo, wapepo ndi ofiira ndipo nsaluyo ikhale yolukidwa bwino, yofewa ndi yosalala. Ndipo anthu aluso apetepo zithunzi za Akerubi.

32.verse: Nsaluyo uyikoloweke pa nsanamira zinayi zamtengo wa mkesha zokutidwa ndi golide zomwe zili ndi ngowe zagolide, zomwe zayima pa matsinde asiliva anayi.

33.verse: Ukoloweke kataniyo ku ngowe ndipo uyike Bokosi la Chipangano mʼkatimo. Kataniyo idzalekanitse malo wopatulika ndi malo wopatulika kwambiri.

34.verse: Uyike chivundikiro pa bokosi laumboni ku malo wopatulika kwambiri.

35.verse: Uyike tebulo kunja kwa katani yotchinga cha kumpoto kwa chihema ndipo uyike choyikapo nyale chija kummwera moyangʼanana ndi tebulolo.

36.verse: “Pa chipata cholowera mu chihema, uyikepo nsalu yamtundu wamtambo, wapepo ndi ofiira, yomwe ndi yofewa ndi yosalala, yopetedwa bwino ndi amisiri aluso.

37.verse: Upange ngowe zagolide za nsaluyo ndi nsanamira zisanu zamtengo wa mkesha ndipo uzikute ndi golide. Upangenso matsinde asanu amkuwa a nsanamirazo.”

1.verse: Guwa Lansembe Yopsereza - “Upange guwa lansembe lamatabwa amtengo wa mkesha. Likhale lofanana mbali zonse, msinkhu wake masentimita 137, mulitali mwake masentimita 229, mulifupi mwake masentimita 229.

2.verse: Upange nyanga imodziimodzi pa ngodya zake zinayizo kuti nyangazo ndi guwalo zikhale chinthu chimodzi, ndipo ulikute guwalo ndi mkuwa.

3.verse: Upange ziwiya zamkuwa izi zogwirira ntchito pa guwalo: miphika yochotsera phulusa, mafosholo, mabeseni owazira magazi, ngowe zokowera nyama ndi zosonkhezera moto.

4.verse: Upange sefa yachitsulo chamkuwa ndipo mʼngodya zake zinayizo upangiremo mphete zamkuwa.

5.verse: Uyike sefayo mmunsi mwa khoma la guwa lansembelo, ndipo ilekezere pakati pa guwa lansembelo.

6.verse: Upange nsichi zamtengo wa mkesha ndipo uzikutire ndi mkuwa.

7.verse: Pamene mukunyamula guwalo, muzilowetsa nsichizo mʼmphetemo mbali zonse ziwiri za guwalo.

8.verse: Guwalo likhale lamatabwa ndi logoba mʼkati mwake. Ulipange monga momwe ndinakuonetsera pa phiri paja.

9.verse: Za Bwalo la Chihema - “Upange bwalo la chihema. Mbali yakummwera ikhale yotalika mamita 46 ndipo ikhale ndi nsalu yotchinga yofewa yosalala yolukidwa bwino.

10.verse: Upangenso mizati makumi awiri, matsinde makumi awiri amkuwa, ndi ngowe zasiliva ndi zingwe za mizatiyo.

11.verse: Mbali yakumpoto ikhalenso yotalika mamita 46 ndipo ikhale ndi nsalu yotchinga. Pakhalenso mizati makumi awiri, matsinde amkuwa makumi awiri, ngowe zasiliva ndi zingwe za mizatiyo.

12.verse: “Mbali yakumadzulo ya bwalolo ikhale yotalika mamita 23 ndipo ikhale ndi nsalu yotchinga, nsichi khumi ndi matsinde khumi.

13.verse: Mbali yakummawa, kotulukira dzuwa, kutalika kwa bwalo kukhale mamita 23.

14.verse: Mbali imodzi yachipata kukhale nsalu yotchinga yotalika mamita asanu ndi awiri, mizati itatu ndi matsinde atatu.

15.verse: Ndipo ku mbali inayo kukhale nsalu yotchinga ya mamita asanu ndi awiri pamodzi ndi mizati itatu ndi matsinde atatu.

16.verse: “Pa chipata cha bwalolo pakhale nsalu yotchinga yamtundu wa mtambo, yapepo ndi yofiira ndiponso yofewa yosalala. Nsaluyo ikhale yotalika mamita asanu ndi anayi, yopangidwa ndi anthu aluso. Pakhalenso mizati yake inayi ndi matsinde akenso anayi.

17.verse: Mizati yonse yozungulira bwalolo ilumikizidwe ndi zingwe zasiliva. Ngowe zake zikhale zasiliva, koma matsinde ake akhale amkuwa.

18.verse: Kutalika kwa bwalolo kukhale mamita 46, mulifupi mwake mamita 23, msinkhu wake masentimita 230. Nsalu ya katani ikhale yofewa ndi yosalala bwino. Matsinde ake akhale amkuwa.

19.verse: Zipangizo zonse zogwiritsa ntchito zosiyanasiyana pa chihemacho, zikhomo za chihema ndi zabwalolo zikhale zamkuwa.

20.verse: Mafuta Anyale - “Lamula Aisraeli kuti akupatse mafuta anyale a olivi wabwino kwambiri kuti nyalezo ziziyaka nthawi zonse.

21.verse: Mʼchihema cha msonkhano, koma kunja kwa nsalu yotchinga Bokosi la Chipangano, Aaroni ndi ana ake azionetsetsa kuti nyale ikukhala chiyakire pamaso pa Yehova kuyambira madzulo mpaka mmawa. Limeneli ndi lamulo lamuyaya pakati pa Aisraeli pa mibado yonse.”

1.verse: Zovala za Ansembe - “Aaroni mʼbale wako ndi ana ake aamuna, Nadabu, Abihu, Eliezara ndi Itamara uwapatule pakati pa Aisraeli. Abwere kwa iwe kuti anditumikire monga ansembe.

2.verse: Umusokere mʼbale wako, Aaroni, zovala zopatulika kuti azioneka mwaulemerero ndi molemekezeka.

3.verse: Uwawuze anthu onse aluso amene Ine ndawapatsa nzeru pa ntchito yosoka kuti apange zovala za Aaroni za pa mwambo womupatula, kuti iye anditumikire monga wansembe.

4.verse: Zovala zoti apange ndi izi: chovala chapachifuwa, efodi, mkanjo, mwinjiro wolukidwa, nduwira ndi lamba. Apangire mʼbale wako Aaroni ndi ana ake aamuna zovala zopatulikazi kuti iwo anditumikire monga ansembe.

5.verse: Iwo agwiritse ntchito golide, nsalu yamtundu wa mtambo, yapepo, yofiira ndi yosalala yofewa.

6.verse: Efodi - “Apange efodi pogwiritsa ntchito golide, nsalu yamtundu wa mtambo, yapepo ndi yofiira yolukidwa mwaluso.

7.verse: Efodiyo ikhale ndi timalamba tiwiri ta pa mapewa tosokerera ku msonga zake ziwiri kuti azitha kumanga.

8.verse: Lamba womangira efodi akhale wolukidwa mwaluso ngati efodiyo. Akhale wopangidwa ndi golide, nsalu yamtundu wa mtambo, yapepo, yofiira, yofewa yosalala.

9.verse: “Utenge miyala iwiri ya onikisi ndipo uzokotepo mayina a ana a Israeli.

10.verse: Mayina asanu ndi limodzi akhale pa mwala umodzi, ndipo mayina asanu ndi limodzi pa mwala winawo motsata mabadwidwe awo.

11.verse: Mayina a ana a Israeli uwazokote pa miyala iwiriyo, monga momwe amachitira mmisiri wozokota miyala. Ndipo uyike miyalayo mu zoyikamo zake zagolide.

12.verse: Umangirire miyala iwiriyi pa tinsalu ta mʼmapewa ta efodi tija ngati miyala ya chikumbutso cha ana a Israeli. Aaroni azinyamula mayinawo mʼmapewa ake kuti akhale chikumbutso pamaso pa Yehova.

13.verse: Upange zoyikamo za maluwa agolide,

14.verse: ndiponso maunyolo awiri a golide wabwino kwambiri, wopetedwa ngati zingwe ndipo uwalumikize ku zoyikamozo.

15.verse: Chovala Chapachifuwa - “Upange chovala chapachifuwa chogwiritsa ntchito poweruza mlandu ndipo uchipange mwaluso kwambiri. Uchipange ngati efodi pogwiritsa ntchito golide, nsalu yamtundu wa mtambo, yapepo, yofiira, yofewa yosalala ndi yolukidwa bwino.

16.verse: Kutalika kwake kukhale kofanana mbali zonse, mulitali masentimita 23, mulifupi masentimita 23, ndipo chikhale chopinda pawiri.

17.verse: Uyikepo mizere inayi ya miyala yokongola kwambiri. Mzere woyamba ukhale ndi miyala ya rubi, topazi ndi berili.

18.verse: Mzere wachiwiri pakhale miyala ya emeradi, safiro ndi dayimondi;

19.verse: mzere wachitatu pakhale miyala ya opera, agate ndi ametisiti.

20.verse: Mzere wachinayi pakhale miyala ya topazi, onikisi ndi yasipa. Miyalayi uyiike mu zoyikamo zagolide.

21.verse: Miyalayo ikhalepo khumi ndi iwiri, uliwonse kuyimira dzina limodzi la ana a Israeli. Mwala uliwonse uzokotedwe ngati chidindo dzina limodzi la mafuko khumi ndi awiri a Israeli.

22.verse: “Upange timaunyolo tagolide wabwino kwambiri ta pa chovala chapachifuwa, topota ngati chingwe.

23.verse: Upangenso mphete ziwiri zagolide ndipo uzimangirire pa ngodya ziwiri za pa chovala chapachifuwa.

24.verse: Umangirire timaunyolo tiwiri tagolide tija pa mphete za pa ngodya pa chovala chapachifuwacho.

25.verse: Ndipo mbali ina ya timaunyoloto umangirire pa zoyikapo zake ziwiri zija ndi kulumikiza pa tinsalu takutsogolo kwa mapewa a efodi.

26.verse: Upangenso mphete ziwiri zagolide, ndipo uzilumikize ku ngodya ziwiri zamʼmunsi mwa chovala chapachifuwa, champhepete mwake, mʼkati pafupi ndi efodi ija.

27.verse: Upangenso mphete zina ziwiri zagolide ndipo uzilumikize kumunsi kwa tinsalu takutsogolo kwa efodi, pafupi ndi msoko, pamwamba pangʼono pa lamba wamʼchiwuno wa efodi.

28.verse: Tsono umangirire mphete za pa chovala chapachifuwa zija ku mphete za efodi ndi chingwe chamtundu wa mtambo, kulumikiza lamba ndi chovala chapachifuwacho kuti chovala chapachifuwacho chisalekane ndi efodi.

29.verse: “Pamene Aaroni akulowa kumalo opatulika azivala chovala chapachifuwa cha zoweruzira chija chimene chalembedwa mayina a ana a Israeli kuti Yehova awakumbukire nthawi zonse.

30.verse: Ndiponso uyike Urimu ndi Tumimu mu chovala chapachifuwa cha zoweruziracho, kuti zikhale pamtima pa Aaroni. Choncho Aaroniyo adzakhala akutenga nthawi zonse zida zomuthandizira kuweruza ana a Israeli pamene adzafika pamaso pa Yehova.

31.verse: Zovala Zina za Ansembe - “Uyipangire efodiyo mkanjo wamtundu wa mtambo.

32.verse: Mkanjowo ukhala ndi malo opisapo mutu pakati pakepo. Pa chibowopo pakhale chibandi chosokedwa mochita ngati kuluka monga muja akhalira malaya kuti chibowocho chilimbe, chisangʼambike.

33.verse: Pa mpendero wamʼmunsi wa mkanjowo, upange mphonje zokhala ngati makangadza za nsalu yamtundu wa mtambo, yapepo ndi yofiira zokhala ndi maberu agolide pakati pake.

34.verse: Choncho pazikhala mphonje imodzi kenaka belu limodzi, kuzungulira mpendero wa mkanjo wonse.

35.verse: Aaroni azivala mkanjowo pamene akutumikira ngati wansembe. Kulira kwa maberu kuzimveka pamene akulowa mʼmalo opatulika pamaso pa Yehova ndiponso pamene akutuluka, kuti asafe.

36.verse: “Upange duwa lagolide wabwino kwambiri kukhala ngati chidindo ndipo uzokotepo mawu akuti, CHOPEREKEDWA KWA YEHOVA.

37.verse: Ulimange ndi chingwe cha nsalu yamtundu wa mtambo pa nduwira ya Aaroni, ndipo duwalo likhale kutsogolo kwa nduwirayo.

38.verse: Lidzakhala pa mphumi ya Aaroni, motero iye adzasenza cholakwa chilichonse cha pa zopereka zilizonse zimene Aisraeli amazipatulira Yehova. Aaroni azivala chikwangwanichi pa mphumi pake nthawi zonse kuti Yehova alandire zopereka za anthu ake.

39.verse: “Uluke mwinjiro wa nsalu yofewa yosalala ndiponso upange nduwira ya nsalu yofewa yosalala. Lamba wake akhale wolukidwa bwino ndi munthu waluso.

40.verse: Upangirenso ana a Aaroni mwinjiro, malamba ndi nduwira kuti azioneka mwaulemu ndi molemekezeka.

41.verse: Zovala zimenezi umuveke Aaroni, mʼbale wako ndi ana ake. Kenaka uwadzoze, uwapatse udindo ndi kuwapatula kuti anditumikire ngati ansembe anga.

42.verse: “Uwapangire akabudula a nsalu yofewa oyambira mʼchiwuno kulekeza mʼntchafu kuti asamaonetse maliseche.

43.verse: Aaroni ndi ana ake ayenera kuvala akabudulawo pamene akulowa mu tenti ya msonkhano kapena pamene akupita ku guwa lansembe kukatumikira malo oyera kuopa kuti angachimwe ndi kufa. “Ili likhale lamulo la nthawi zonse kwa Aaroni ndi zidzukulu zake.”

1.verse: Mwambo Wopatula Ansembe - “Pofuna kumupatula Aaroni ndi ana ake kuti akhale ansembe onditumikira Ine, uchite izi: Utenge ngʼombe yayingʼono yayimuna ndi nkhosa ziwiri zazimuna zopanda chilema.

2.verse: Utengenso buledi wopanda yisiti, makeke wopanda yisiti wopakidwa mafuta. Zonsezi uzipange ndi ufa wosalala wa tirigu.

3.verse: Uziyike mʼdengu ndipo ubwere nazo kwa Ine pamodzi ndi ngʼombe yayimuna ija ndi nkhosa ziwiri zazimuna zija.

4.verse: Kenaka ubwere naye Aaroni ndi ana ake pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano ndipo uwasambitse ndi madzi.

5.verse: Tenga zovala ndipo umuveke Aaroni mwinjiro, mkanjo wa efodi, efodiyo ndi chovala chapachifuwa. Umumange mʼchiwuno lamba wa efodi wolukidwa mwaluso uja.

6.verse: Umuveke nduwira kumutu, ndiponso uyike chizindikiro chopatulika chija pa nduwirayo.

7.verse: Utenge mafuta wodzozera ndipo uwatsanulire pamutu pake kumudzoza.

8.verse: Ubwere ndi ana ake aamuna ndipo uwavekenso minjiro

9.verse: ndi nduwira. Kenaka umange malamba Aaroniyo pamodzi ndi ana ake ndi kuwaveka nduwira. Motero unsembe udzakhala wawo malingana ndi lamulo ili losatha. “Umu ndi mmene udzadzozere Aaroni ndi ana ake aamuna.

10.verse: “Ubwere ndi ngʼombe yayimuna pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano ndipo Aaroni ndi ana ake asanjike manja awo pamutu pake.

11.verse: Uphe ngʼombeyo pamaso pa Yehova pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano.

12.verse: Utenge magazi ena angʼombeyo ndi kupaka ndi chala chako pa nyanga zaguwa lansembe ndipo magazi otsalawo uwakhutulire pa tsinde laguwalo.

13.verse: Kenaka utenge mafuta onse okuta matumbo, mafuta ophimba chiwindi ndiponso impsyo zonse ziwiri pamodzi ndi mafuta ake. Zonsezi uzitenthe pa guwapo.

14.verse: Koma nyama yangʼombeyo, chikopa chake ndi matumbo ake uziwotche kunja kwa msasa. Iyi ndi nsembe yopepesera machimo.

15.verse: “Utenge nkhosa yayimuna imodzi ndipo Aaroni ndi ana ake aamuna asanjike manja awo pamutu pake.

16.verse: Uyiphe ndipo utenge magazi ake ndi kuwaza mbali zonse zaguwalo.

17.verse: Uyidule nkhosayo nthulinthuli, kutsuka matumbo ake ndi miyendo yake. Ukatero, pamodzi ndi mutu wake, uziyike pamwamba pa nthulizo.

18.verse: Ndipo uwotche nkhosa yonseyo pa guwa lansembe. Iyi ndi nsembe yopsereza ya kwa Yehova. Ili ndi fungo lokoma, loperekedwa pa moto kwa Yehova.

19.verse: “Utenge nkhosa yayimuna ina ndipo Aaroni ndi ana ake aamuna asanjike manja awo pamutu pake.

20.verse: Uyiphe ndipo utenge magazi ake ena ndi kupaka ndewere za makutu a kudzanja lamanja la Aaroni ndi ana ake aamuna. Upakenso pa zala zawo zazikulu za kudzanja lawo lamanja, ndi zala zazikulu za kuphazi lakudzanja lawo lamanja. Kenaka uwaze magazi otsalawo mbali zonse za guwalo.

21.verse: Ndipo utenge magazi ena amene ali pa guwa lansembe komanso pa mafuta ena odzozera ndipo uwawaze pa Aaroni ndi zovala zake ndi ana ake ndi zovala zawo. Ndiye kuti iyeyo ndi ana ake aamuna adzakhala opatulika pamodzi ndi zovala zawo.

22.verse: “Pa nkhosa yayimuna ija utengepo mafuta ake, mafuta a ku mchira wake, mafuta okuta matumbo, mafuta okuta chiwindi, impsyo zonse ziwiri ndi mafuta ake, ndiponso ntchafu yakumanja. Iyi ndi nkhosa ya mwambo wodzoza.

23.verse: Utengenso mʼdengu la buledi wopanda yisiti limene lili pamaso pa Yehova, buledi mmodzi, buledi wokhala ndi mafuta a olivi, ndi buledi wopyapyala mmodzi.

24.verse: Izi zonse uzipereke mʼmanja mwa Aaroni ndi ana ake, ndipo iwo aziweyule pamaso pa Yehova kuti zikhale nsembe yoweyula.

25.verse: Kenaka uzitenge mʼmanja mwawo ndipo uzipsereze pa guwa lansembe, pamwamba penipeni pamodzi ndi nsembe yopsereza kuti ipereke fungo lokoma kwa Yehova. Ichi ndiye chopereka chachakudya kwa Yehova.

26.verse: Kenaka utenge chidale cha nkhosa yayimuna imene inaperekedwa pamwambo wodzoza Aaroni, uchiweyule kuti chikhale nsembe yoweyula pamaso pa Yehova ndipo chidzakhala gawo lako.

27.verse: “Uzipatule ziwalo zonse za nkhosa ya pa mwambo wodzoza Aaroni ndi ana ake. Chidale chimene unaweyula chija ndiponso ntchafu imene inaperekedwa ija.

28.verse: Nsembe izi ndi zimene Aisraeli azipereka kwa Aaroni ndi ana ake mwa zonse zimene azipereka nthawi zonse. Mwa zopereka za mtendere zimene ana a Aisraeli adzapereka kwa Yehova, zimenezi zikhale gawo lawo.

29.verse: “Zovala zopatulika za Aaroni zidzakhala za ana ake aamuna iye atafa kuti adzavale podzozedwa ndi polandira udindo wawo.

30.verse: Mwana amene adzalowa mʼmalo mwake monga wansembe pamene adzabwerera kudzalowa mu tenti ya msonkhano kudzatumikira ku malo wopatulika, adzavala zovala zimenezi masiku asanu ndi awiri.

31.verse: “Utenge nkhosa yayimuna ya pamwambo wodzoza ansembe ndipo uyiphike pamalo opatulika.

32.verse: Aaroni ndi ana ake adye nyama ya nkhosa yayimunayi pamodzi ndi buledi amene ali mʼdengu pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano.

33.verse: Adye zonse zimene anazipereka kwa Yehova pamwambo wopepesera machimo powadzoza ndi kuwapatula. Munthu wamba asadye chifukwa ndi zopatulika.

34.verse: Ndipo ngati nyama ina ya nkhosa ya pamwambo wodzoza ansembe kapena buledi zatsala mpaka mmawa, muziwotche, asazidye chifukwa ndi zopatulika.

35.verse: “Uchitire Aaroni ndi ana ake aamuna zonse zimene ndakulamulazi. Uchite mwambo wowapatula kukhala ansembe masiku asanu ndi awiri.

36.verse: Tsiku lililonse uzipereka ngʼombe yayimuna ngati nsembe yopepesera machimo kuti machimowo akhululukidwe. Ndiponso upatule guwalo popereka nsembe yopepesera ndi kulidzoza mafuta kuti likhale lopatulika.

37.verse: Pa masiku asanu ndi awiri uzipereka pa guwapo nsembe zoyeretsera guwalo, ukatero ndiye kuti uzilipatula. Ndipo guwa lansembelo lidzakhala loyera kwambiri, ndipo chilichonse chimene chidzakhudza guwalo chidzayeretsedwa.

38.verse: “Tsiku ndi tsiku pa guwa lansembe uzipereka izi: Ana ankhosa a chaka chimodzi awiri.

39.verse: Mmawa muzipereka mwana wankhosa mmodzi ndipo winayo madzulo.

40.verse: Pamodzi ndi mwana wankhosa woyambayo, muzipereka kilogalamu imodzi ya ufa wosalala wosakaniza ndi lita imodzi ya mafuta a olivi pamodzi ndi lita imodzi ya vinyo ngati chopereka chachakumwa.

41.verse: Upereke mwana wankhosa winayo madzulo pamodzi ndi chopereka chachakudya monga poyamba paja ndi chopereka chachakumwa monga mmawa kuti ikhale fungo lokoma la chopereka chachakudya kwa Yehova.

42.verse: “Zopereka zopsereza zimenezi ziziperekedwa nthawi zonse, pa mibado yonse. Muzidzazipereka pamaso pa Yehova pa khomo la tenti ya msonkhano. Pa guwa lansembe, Yehova adzakumana nanu ndi kuyankhula nanu.

43.verse: Pameneponso Ine ndidzakumana ndi Aisraeli, ndipo guwalo lidzakhala lopatulika chifukwa cha ulemerero wanga.

44.verse: “Tsono Ine ndidzapatula tenti ya msonkhano ndi guwa lansembe. Ndidzapatulanso Aaroni pamodzi ndi ana ake kuti akhale ansembe anga onditumikira.

45.verse: Ndidzakhala pakati pa Aisraeli ndikukhala Mulungu wawo.

46.verse: Adzadziwa kuti ine ndine Mulungu wawo amene ndinawatulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto kuti ndikhale pakati pawo. Ine ndine Yehova, Mulungu wawo.”

1.verse: Guwa Lansembe Yofukiza - Upange guwa lamatabwa amtengo wa mkesha lofukizirapo lubani.

2.verse: Likhale lofanana mbali zonse. Mulitali masentimita 46, mulifupi masentimita 46, ndipo msinkhu masentimita 91. Nyanga zake zipangidwe kumodzi ndi guwalo.

3.verse: Ukute guwa lonse ndi golide wabwino kwambiri, pamwamba pake, mbali zonse zinayi, pamodzi ndi nyanga zake. Ndipo upange mkombero wagolide kuzungulira guwalo.

4.verse: Upange mphete ziwiri zagolide ndipo uzilumikize ku guwa mʼmunsi mwa mkombero, mphete ziwiri ku mbali zonse ziwiri zoyangʼanana. Mphetozo zizigwira nsichi zonyamulira guwalo.

5.verse: Upange mizati yamtengo wa mkesha ndipo uyikute ndi golide.

6.verse: Uyike guwalo patsogolo pa nsalu yotchinga Bokosi la Chipangano. Apa ndi pamene ndizidzakumana nawe.

7.verse: “Aaroni ayenera kumafukiza lubani wonunkhira pa guwalo mmawa uliwonse. Pamene akukonza nyale zija afukizenso lubani.

8.verse: Aaroni ayenera kufukizanso lubani pamene ayatsa nyale madzulo kuti lubani akhale akuyaka nthawi zonse pamaso pa Yehova kwa mibado imene ikubwera.

9.verse: Pa guwapo usafukize lubani wachilendo kapena kuperekapo nsembe yopsereza kapena nsembe yaufa. Usathire pa guwapo ngakhale nsembe yachakumwa.

10.verse: Aaroni azidzapereka nsembe yopepesera machimo pa nyanga za guwalo kamodzi pa chaka. Mwambowu uzidzachitika pogwiritsa ntchito magazi a nsembe yopepesera machimo, ndipo zizidzachitika mʼmibado yanu yonse. Choncho guwa lansembelo lidzakhala loyera ndi loperekedwa kwa Yehova.”

11.verse: Za Chopereka Chowombolera Moyo - Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose,

12.verse: “Pamene ukuchita kalembera wa Aisraeli, munthu aliyense ayenera kupereka kwa Yehova chowombolera moyo wake pamene akuwerengedwa. Motero mliri sudzabwera pa iwo pamene ukuwawerenga.

13.verse: Izi ndi zimene aliyense wolembedwa mu kawundula ayenera kupereka: theka la sekeli, kutanthauza ndalama zolemera magalamu asanu ndi limodzi malingana ndi kawerengedwe ka ndalama za ku Nyumba ya Mulungu. Paja sekeli imodzi ikulingana ndi magera makumi awiri. Theka la sekeli chidzakhala chopereka cha kwa Yehova.

14.verse: Aliyense wolembedwa mu kawundula amene ali ndi zaka makumi awiri kapena kupitirira ayenera kupereka chopereka kwa Yehova.

15.verse: Anthu olemera asapereke koposa theka la sekeli ndipo osauka asapereke kuchepera theka la sekeli pamene mukupereka nsembe kwa Yehova yowombolera miyoyo yanu.

16.verse: Ulandire ndalama zopepeserazo kuchokera kwa Aisraeli ndipo zigwiritsidwe ntchito ya ku tenti ya msonkhano. Zoperekazi zidzakhala chikumbutso cha Aisraeli pamaso pa Yehova, ndiponso zowombolera miyoyo yanu.”

17.verse: Za Beseni Losambira - Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose,

18.verse: “Upange beseni lamkuwa lokhala ndi miyendo yamkuwanso. Uliyike pakati pa tenti ya msonkhano ndi guwa lansembe ndipo uthiremo madzi.

19.verse: Aaroni ndi ana ake azisamba mʼmanja ndi kutsuka mapazi awo ndi madzi amenewo.

20.verse: Pamene akulowa mu tenti ya msonkhano, iwo asambe madziwa kuti asafe. Ndiponso pamene akupita kukatumikira ku guwa lansembe ndi kupereka nsembe yopsereza kwa Yehova,

21.verse: azisamba mʼmanja mwawo ndi kutsuka mapazi kuti asadzafe. Limeneli ndi lamulo limene Aaroni, pamodzi ndi ana ndi zidzukulu zake mʼtsogolomo ayenera kumadzalitsatira mpaka muyaya.”

22.verse: Mafuta Wodzozera - Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose,

23.verse: “Utenge zonunkhira bwino kwambiri izi: makilogalamu asanu ndi limodzi a mure wamadzi, makilogalamu atatu a zonunkhira bwino za mtundu wa sinamoni, makilogalamu atatu a nzimbe yonunkhira bwino kwambiri,

24.verse: makilogalamu asanu ndi limodzi a mkesha. Zonsezi zikhale malingana ndi muyeso wa ku Nyumba ya Mulungu. Pakhalenso malita anayi a mafuta a olivi.

25.verse: Ugwiritse ntchito zinthu zimenezi kupanga mafuta opatulika odzozera, mafuta onunkhira, apangidwe ndi mʼmisiri waluso lopanga zonunkhiritsa. Awa adzakhala mafuta opatulika odzozera.

26.verse: Tsono uwagwiritse ntchito podzoza tenti ya msonkhano, Bokosi la Chipangano,

27.verse: tebulo, ndi ziwiya zake zonse, choyikapo nyale ndi zipangizo zake, guwa lofukizirapo lubani,

28.verse: guwa lansembe yopsereza ndi ziwiya zake zonse, ndiponso beseni pamodzi ndi nsichi yake.

29.verse: Zonsezi uzipatule kuti zidzakhale zopatulika, ndipo chilichonse chimene chidzakhudza zimenezi chidzakhala chopatulika.

30.verse: “Udzoze Aaroni ndi ana ake aamuna ndi kuwapatula kuti akhale ansembe onditumikira.

31.verse: Tsono awuze a Israeli kuti, mafuta wodzozera awa adzakhala wopatulika mpaka muyaya.

32.verse: Musadzadzozere munthu wamba mafuta amenewa, ndipo musadzapange mafuta wofanana ndi amenewa. Mafutawa ndi wopatulika ndipo akhale woyera kwa inu.

33.verse: Wina aliyense amene adzapanga mafuta wonunkhira wofanana nawo kapena kudzozera mafutawa munthu wamba osati wansembe ayenera kuchotsedwa pakati pa anthu anzake.”

34.verse: Za Zofukiza - Kenaka Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Tenga muyeso wofanana wa zinthu zonunkhira izi: sitakate, onika, galibanumu pamodzi ndi lubani weniweni.

35.verse: Uziphatikize pamodzi zonsezi ndi kupanga lubani monga amachitira mmisiri wopanga zonunkhira. Athire mchere ndipo akhale woyera ndi wopatulika.

36.verse: Upere gawo lina mosalala kwambiri ndipo utapepo pangʼono ndi kuyika patsogolo pa Bokosi la Chipangano mu tenti ya msonkhano, kumene ine ndidzakumane nawe. Lubani ameneyu kwa inu adzakhala wopatulika kwambiri.

37.verse: Musapange lubani wanu potsatira njira iyi. Lubani yense wopangidwa mwa njira iyi akhale wopatulika, woperekedwa kwa Yehova.

38.verse: Aliyense amene adzapanga wofanana naye kuti asangalale ndi fungo lake ayenera kuchotsedwa pakati pa anthu anzake.”

1.verse: Bezaleli ndi Oholiabu - Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose,

2.verse: “Taona, ndasankha Bezaleli mwana wa Uri, mwana wa Huri, wa fuko la Yuda.

3.verse: Ndipo ndamudzaza ndi Mzimu wa Mulungu kotero kuti ali ndi luso ndi nzeru zomvetsa zinthu ndipo akudziwa bwino ntchito zonse zamanja monga izi:

4.verse: Kulemba ndondomeko ya ntchito zaluso ndi kupanga zinthu zagolide, zasiliva ndi zamkuwa,

5.verse: kusema ndi kuyika miyala yokongola, kukonza zinthu zamatabwa ndiponso kugwira ntchito ina iliyonse yamanja.

6.verse: Ndasankhanso Oholiabu mwana wa Ahisamaki wa fuko la Dani. Ndiponso ndapereka nzeru kwa anthu aluso motero adzagwira ntchito zonse zimene ndakulamulira kuti zichitike monga izi:

7.verse: Kupanga tenti ya msonkhano, bokosi laumboni pamodzi ndi chophimbira chake, ndiponso zonse za mu tenti,

8.verse: tebulo ndi zida zake, choyikapo nyale cha golide wabwino kwambiri ndi ziwiya zake zonse, guwa lofukizirapo lubani,

9.verse: guwa lansembe yopsereza ndi ziwiya zake zonse, beseni ndi nsichi yake,

10.verse: ndiponso zovala zonse zolukidwa, zovala zopatulika za Aaroni wansembe pamodzi ndi za ana ake, zovala pamene akutumikira monga ansembe,

11.verse: ndiponso mafuta odzozera ndi lubani wonunkhira wa ku malo opatulika. Iwo azipanga monga momwe Ine ndinakulamulira.”

12.verse: Za Sabata - Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose,

13.verse: “Uza ana a Israeli kuti azisunga Masabata anga. Ichi chidzakhala chizindikiro pakati pa inu ndi Ine pamodzi ndi zidzukulu zanu mʼtsogolomo, chosonyeza kuti Ine ndine amene ndimakuyeretsani.

14.verse: “Motero muzisunga tsiku la Sabata chifukwa ndi loyera kwa inu. Aliyense amene adetsa tsiku la Sabata ayenera kuphedwa. Aliyense amene agwira ntchito iliyonse pa tsikuli ayenera kuchotsedwa pakati pa anthu anzake.

15.verse: Mugwire ntchito kwa masiku asanu ndi limodzi koma tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri ndi Sabata, lopuma, tsiku lopatulika la Yehova. Aliyense amene agwira ntchito iliyonse pa tsiku la Sabata ayenera kuphedwa.

16.verse: Aisraeli onse komanso zidzukulu zawo mʼtsogolo azidzasunga tsiku la Sabata ngati pangano lamuyaya.

17.verse: Tsiku la Sabata lidzakhala chizindikiro chamuyaya pakati pa Ine ndi Aisraeli chosonyeza kuti Yehova analenga za kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi kwa masiku asanu ndi limodzi ndi kuti pa tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri analeka kugwira ntchito napumula.”

18.verse: Yehova atamaliza kuyankhula ndi Mose pa phiri la Sinai, anamupatsa Mose miyala iwiri yaumboni, imene Mulungu analembapo ndi chala chake.

1.verse: Za Fano la Mwana Wangʼombe Wagolide - Anthu ataona kuti Mose akuchedwa kutsika mʼphiri, anasonkhana kwa Aaroni ndipo anati, “Bwera utipangire milungu imene idzititsogolera. Kunena za Mose amene anatitulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto, sitikudziwa chimene chamuchitikira.”

2.verse: Aaroni anawayankha kuti, “Vulani ndolo zagolide zimene avala akazi anu, ana anu aamuna ndi aakazi ndipo muzibweretse kwa ine.”

3.verse: Kotero anthu onse anavula ndolo zagolide ndi kubwera nazo kwa Aaroni.

4.verse: Choncho Aaroni analandira golideyo ndipo anamuwumba ndi chikombole ndi kupanga fano la mwana wangʼombe. Kenaka anthu aja anati, “Inu Aisraeli, nayu mulungu wanu amene anakutulutsani mʼdziko la Igupto.”

5.verse: Aaroni ataona izi, anamanga guwa lansembe patsogolo pa mwana wangʼombeyo ndipo analengeza kuti, “Mawa kudzakhala chikondwerero cha Yehova.”

6.verse: Kotero tsiku linalo anthu anadzuka mmamawa ndithu ndi kupereka nsembe zopsereza ndi nsembe zachiyanjano. Atatha kupereka nsembezo, anthuwo anakhala pansi nayamba kudya ndi kumwa. Kenaka anayimirira nayamba kuvina mwachilendo.

7.verse: Pamenepo Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Tsika msanga, chifukwa anthu ako amene unawatulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto aja adziyipitsa kwambiri.

8.verse: Iwo apatuka mwamsanga kuleka kutsatira zimene ndinawalamula. Ndiye adzipangira fano la mwana wangʼombe. Aligwadira ndi kuliperekera nsembe nʼkumati, ‘Inu Aisraeli, nayu mulungu wanu amene anakutulutsani mʼdziko la Igupto.’ ”

9.verse: Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Ine ndikuwadziwa anthu amenewa. Iwowa ndi ankhutukumve.

10.verse: Chifukwa chake undileke kuti mkwiyo wanga uyake pa iwo ndi kuwawononga. Ndipo Ine ndidzakusandutsa kuti ukhale mtundu waukulu.”

11.verse: Koma Mose anapempha chifundo cha Mulungu wake ndipo anati, “Chonde Yehova, chifukwa chiyani mwakwiyira anthu awa amene munawatulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto ndi mphamvu yanu yayikulu ndi dzanja lanu lamphamvu.

12.verse: Kodi mukufuna kuti Aigupto azinena kuti, ‘Munali ndi cholinga choyipa chofuna kuwaphera ku mapiri kuno ndi kuwawonongeratu pa dziko lapansi pamene munkawatulutsa ku Igupto kuja?’ Ayi, chonde mkwiyo wanu woyaka ngati motowu ubwezeni ndipo sinthani maganizo ofunira zoyipa anthu anu.

13.verse: Kumbukirani atumiki anu, Abrahamu, Isake, Israeli ndi zija munawalonjeza polumbira pa dzina lanu kuti, ‘Ine ndidzachulukitsa zidzukulu zanu ndipo zidzakhala zambiri ngati nyenyezi zakumwamba. Zidzukulu zanuzo ndidzazipatsa dziko lonseli limene ndinalonjeza. Dziko limeneli lidzakhala lawo nthawi zonse.’ ”

14.verse: Choncho Yehova analeka ndipo sanawachitire choyipa anthu ake monga anaopsezera.

15.verse: Mose anatembenuka ndi kutsika phiri miyala iwiri ya pangano ili mʼmanja mwake. Miyalayi inalembedwa mbali zonse, kutsogolo ndi kumbuyo komwe.

16.verse: Miyalayi anayikonza ndi Mulungu. Malembawo analemba ndi Mulungu mozokota pa miyalapo.

17.verse: Pamene Yoswa anamva phokoso la anthu anati kwa Mose, “Ku msasa kuli phokoso la nkhondo.”

18.verse: Mose anayankha kuti, “Phokoso limeneli sindikulimva ngati phokoso la opambana nkhondo, kapena kulira kwa ongonjetsedwa pa nkhondo. Koma ndikulimva ngati phokoso la anthu amene akuyimba.”

19.verse: Mose atayandikira msasa ndi kuona mwana wangʼombe ndiponso kuvina, anakwiya kwambiri ndipo anaponya pansi miyala imene inali mʼmanja mwake, ndi kuyiphwanya pa tsinde la phiri.

20.verse: Ndipo iye anatenga mwana wangʼombe amene anthu anapanga uja ndi kumuwotcha pa moto ndi kumuperapera ndikukhala ngati fumbi. Kenaka anawaza fumbilo mʼmadzi ndi kuwamwetsa Aisraeli madziwo.

21.verse: Tsono Mose anafunsa Aaroni kuti, “Kodi anthu awa anakuchita chiyani kuti uwachimwitse koopsa chotere?”

22.verse: Aaroni anayankha kuti, “Musakwiye mbuye wanga. Inu mukudziwa kuti anthu awa ndi ovuta.

23.verse: Iwo anati kwa ine, ‘Bwera utipangire milungu imene idzititsogolera. Kunena za Mose amene anatitulutsa ife mʼdziko la Igupto, sitikudziwa chimene chamuchitikira.’

24.verse: Choncho ine ndinawawuza kuti, ‘Aliyense amene ali ndi zokometsera zagolide azivule.’ Choncho iwo anandipatsa golide, ndipo ndinamuponya pa moto ndi kupanga fano la mwana wangʼombeyu.”

25.verse: Mose anaona kuti anthuwo anali osokonezekadi chifukwa Aaroni anawalekerera mpaka kusanduka anthu osekedwa pakati pa adani awo.

26.verse: Choncho iye anayima pa chipata cholowera mu msasa ndipo anati, “Aliyense amene ali mbali ya Yehova abwere kwa ine.” Ndipo Alevi onse anapita mbali yake.

27.verse: Ndipo iye anawawuza kuti, “Izi ndi zimene Yehova Mulungu wa Israeli akunena, ‘Pitani ku misasa konse, mulowe ku zipata zonse ndipo aliyense akaphe mʼbale wake, kapena mnzake kapena mnansi wake.’ ”

28.verse: Alevi anachita zomwe Mose analamula, ndipo tsiku limenelo panafa anthu pafupifupi 3,000.

29.verse: Kenaka Mose anati, “Lero mwadzipatula nokha kukhala ansembe otumikira Yehova. Mwachita izi popeza aliyense wa inu wapha mwana wake kapena mʼbale wake. Tsono lero Yehova wakudalitsani.”

30.verse: Mmawa mwake Mose anati kwa anthu onse, “Inu mwachita tchimo lalikulu. Koma tsopano ine ndipita ku phiri kwa Yehova mwina ndikatha kukupepeserani chifukwa cha tchimo lanu.”

31.verse: Kotero Mose anabwereranso kwa Yehova ndipo anati, “Aa! Anthu awa achita tchimo lalikulu! Iwo adzipangira milungu yagolide.

32.verse: Koma tsopano, chonde akhululukireni tchimo lawo. Ngati simutero, ndiye mundifute ine mʼbuku limene mwalemba.”

33.verse: Yehova anamuyankha Mose kuti, “Ndidzafuta mʼbuku aliyense amene wandichimwira.

34.verse: Tsopano pita ukawatsogolere anthu kumalo kumene ine ndinanena, ndipo mngelo wanga adzakutsogolerani. Komabe, nthawi yanga ikadzafika kuti ndiwalange, ndidzawalanga chifukwa cha tchimo lawo.”

35.verse: Ndipo Yehova anawakantha anthuwo ndi mliri chifukwa anawumiriza Aaroni kuti awapangire fano la mwana wangʼombe.

1.verse: Ndipo Yehova anati, “Chokani pa malo ano, iwe ndi anthu amene unawatulutsa mʼdziko la Igupto. Pitani ku dziko limene ine ndinalonjeza ndi lumbiro kwa Abrahamu, Isake ndi Yakobo kuti, ‘Ine ndidzalipereka kwa zidzukulu zanu.’

2.verse: Ndipo ndidzatumiza mngelo patsogolo panu kuthamangitsa Akanaani, Aamori, Ahiti, Aperezi, Ahivi ndi Ayebusi.

3.verse: Pitani ku dziko loyenda mkaka ndi uchi. Koma ine sindidzapita nanu, chifukwa anthu inu ndinu nkhutukumve ndipo nditha kukuwonongani mʼnjiramo.”

4.verse: Anthu atamva mawu owopsawa, anayamba kulira ndipo palibe anavala zodzikometsera.

5.verse: Pakuti Yehova anali atanena kwa Mose kuti, “Awuze Aisraeli kuti, ‘Inu ndinu nkhutukumve.’ Ngati ine ndipita ndi inu kwa kanthawi, nditha kukuwonongani. Tsopano vulani zodzikometsera zanu ndipo ine ndidzaganiza choti ndichite nanu.”

6.verse: Kotero Aisraeli anavula zodzikometsera zawo pa phiri la Horebu.

7.verse: Tenti ya Msonkhano - Tsono Mose ankatenga tenti ndi kukayimanga kunja kwa msasa chapatalipo, ndipo ankayitcha “tenti ya msonkhano.” Aliyense wofuna kukafunsa kanthu kwa Yehova amapita ku tenti ya msonkhano kunja kwa msasa.

8.verse: Ndipo nthawi ina iliyonse imene Mose amapita ku tenti anthu onse amanyamuka ndi kuyimirira pa makomo amatenti awo, kumuyangʼana Mose mpaka atalowa mu tentimo.

9.verse: Mose akamalowa mu tenti, chipilala cha mtambo chimatsika ndi kukhala pa khomo pamene Yehova amayankhula ndi Mose.

10.verse: Nthawi zonse anthu akaona chipilala cha mtambo chitayima pa khomo la tentiyo amayimirira ndi kupembedza, aliyense ali pa khomo la tenti yake.

11.verse: Yehova amayankhula ndi Mose maso ndi maso ngati mmene munthu amayankhulira ndi bwenzi lake. Kenaka Mose amabwerera ku msasa koma womuthandiza wake, Yoswa, mwana wa Nuni samachoka pa tentiyo.

12.verse: Mose ndi Ulemerero wa Yehova - Mose anati kwa Yehova, “Inu mwakhala mukundiwuza kuti, ‘Tsogolera anthu awa,’ koma simunandiwuze amene mudzamutuma kuti apite pamodzi nane. Inu mwanena kuti, ‘Ndikukudziwa bwino kwambiri ndipo wapeza chisomo pamaso panga.’

13.verse: Ngati mwakondwera nane ndiphunzitseni njira zanu kuti ndikudziweni ndi kupitiriza kupeza chisomo pamaso panu. Kumbukirani kuti mtundu uwu ndi anthu anu.”

14.verse: Yehova anayankha kuti, “Ine ndemwe ndidzapita pamodzi ndi iwe, ndipo ndidzakupatsa mpumulo.”

15.verse: Kenaka Mose anati kwa Yehova, “Ngati inu simupita nafe, musatitumize kuti tipite, kutichotsa pano.

16.verse: Kodi wina adzadziwa bwanji kuti inu mwandikomera mtima pamodzi ndi anthu awa ngati simupita nafe? Kodi nʼchiyani chomwe chidzatisiyanitse pakati pa anthu onse amene ali pa dziko lapansi?”

17.verse: Ndipo Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Ine ndidzachita zimene iwe wandipempha chifukwa Ine ndikukondwera nawe, ndikukudziwa bwino lomwe.”

18.verse: Kenaka Mose anati, “Tsopano ndionetseni ulemerero wanu.”

19.verse: Ndipo Yehova anati, “Ine ndidzakuonetsa ulemerero wanga wonse ndipo ndidzatchula dzina langa lakuti Yehova pamaso pako. Ine ndidzachitira chifundo amene ndikufuna kumuchitira chifundo ndipo ndidzakomera mtima amene ndikufuna kumukomera mtima.”

20.verse: Iye anati, “Koma iwe sungaone nkhope yanga, pakuti palibe munthu amene amaona Ine nakhala ndi moyo.”

21.verse: Ndipo Yehova anati, “Pali malo pafupi ndi ine pomwe ungathe kuyima pa thanthwe.

22.verse: Pamene ulemerero wanga udutsa, ndidzakuyika mʼphanga la thanthwe ndi kukuphimba ndi dzanja langa mpaka nditadutsa.

23.verse: Kenaka ine ndidzachotsa dzanja langa ndipo iwe udzaona msana wanga, koma nkhope yanga sidzaoneka.”

1.verse: Miyala ina Yatsopano - Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Sema miyala iwiri yofanana ndi yoyamba ija, ndipo Ine ndidzalembapo mawu amene anali pa miyala yoyamba ija, imene unayiphwanya.

2.verse: Ukonzeke mmamawa, ndipo ubwere ku Phiri la Sinai. Udzaonekera pamaso panga pamwamba pa phiri.

3.verse: Palibe amene abwere nawe kapena kuoneka pena paliponse pafupi ndi phiri. Ndipo ngakhale nkhosa kapena ngʼombe zisadye mʼmbali mwa phirilo.”

4.verse: Choncho Mose anasema miyala iwiri yofanana ndi yoyamba ija ndipo anapita ku Phiri la Sinai mmawa atanyamula miyala iwiri mʼmanja mwake monga momwe Yehova anamulamulira.

5.verse: Ndipo Yehova anatsika mu mtambo ndi kuyima pamodzi ndi Mose ndi kulengeza dzina lake lakuti Yehova.

6.verse: Ndipo Iye anadutsa kutsogolo kwa Mose akulengeza kuti, “Yehova, Yehova, Mulungu wachifundo ndi wokoma mtima, wosapsa mtima msanga, wodzaza ndi chikondi chosasinthika ndi kukhulupirika,

7.verse: waonetsa chikondi chosasinthika kwa anthu miyandamiyanda, wokhululukira zoyipa, kuwukira, ndiponso tchimo, komatu salekerera ochimwa kuti asalangidwe. Iye amalanga ana ndi zidzukulu chifukwa cha machimo a makolo awo mpaka mʼbado wachitatu ndi wachinayi.”

8.verse: Pamenepo Mose anawerama pansi napembedza.

9.verse: Iye anati, “Chonde Ambuye, ngati ndapeza chisomo pamaso panu, lolani Ambuye kuti mupite nafe pamodzi. Ngakhale kuti anthuwa ndi nkhutukumve, khululukirani zoyipa ndi machimo athu, ndipo mutenge ife kukhala anthu anu.”

10.verse: Choncho Yehova anati: “Ine ndikuchita nanu pangano. Ndidzachita zodabwitsa pamaso pa anthu onse zimene sizinachitikenso ndi mtundu wina uliwonse wa anthu pa dziko lonse lapansi. Anthu amene mudzakhala pakati pawo adzaona kuopsa kwa ntchito imene Ine Yehova ndidzakuchitireni.

11.verse: Mverani zimene ndikukulamulirani lero. Ine ndidzathamangitsa pamaso panu Aamori, Akanaani, Ahiti, Aperezi, Ahivi, ndi Ayebusi.

12.verse: Musamale kuti musakachite mgwirizano ndi anthu amene akukhala mʼdziko limene mukupitalo, chifukwa mukadzatero iwo adzakhala ngati msampha pakati panu.

13.verse: Mukagumule maguwa awo ansembe, mukaswe miyala yawo yachipembedzo, ndipo mukadule mitengo yawo ya Asera.

14.verse: Musapembedze mulungu wina, pakuti Yehova amene dzina lake ndi Nsanje, ndi Mulungu wa nsanje.

15.verse: “Musamale kuti musakachite mgwirizano ndi anthu amene akukhala mʼdziko limene mukupitalo, chifukwa iwo akamakachita zadama ndi milungu yawo ndi kupereka nsembe, adzakuyitanani ndipo inu mudzadya nsembe zawo.

16.verse: Ndipo inu mukasankha ena mwa ana awo aakazi kukhala akazi a ana anu, akaziwo akakachita zadama ndi milungu yawo, akatsogolera ana anu aamuna kuchita chimodzimodzi.

17.verse: “Musadzipangire milungu yosungunula.

18.verse: “Muzichita chikondwerero cha buledi wopanda yisiti. Kwa masiku asanu ndi awiri muzidya buledi wopanda yisiti monga momwe ndinakulamulirani. Muzichita zimenezi pa nthawi yoyikika mwezi wa Abibu, pakuti mwezi umenewu inu munatuluka mʼdziko la Igupto.

19.verse: “Mwana aliyense woyamba kubadwa ndi wanga, pamodzi ndi ziweto zoyamba kubadwa zazimuna kuchokera ku ngʼombe kapena nkhosa.

20.verse: Muziwombola mwana woyamba kubadwa wa bulu popereka mwana wankhosa. Mukapanda kumuwombola mupheni. Muziwombola ana anu onse aamuna. “Palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe adzaonekere pamaso panga wopanda kanthu mʼdzanja lake.

21.verse: “Muzigwira ntchito masiku asanu ndi limodzi, koma tsiku lachisanu ndi chiwiri, musagwire ntchito ina iliyonse, Ngakhale nthawi yolima ndi yokolola muyenera kupuma.

22.verse: “Muzichita Chikondwerero cha Masabata, chifukwa ndi chikondwerero cha tirigu woyambirira kucha, ndiponso ndi chikondwerero cha kututa zokolola pakutha pa chaka.

23.verse: Amuna onse azionekera pamaso pa Yehova Mulungu wa Israeli, katatu pa chaka.

24.verse: Ine ndidzapirikitsa mitundu inayo pamene inu mukufikako ndi kukulitsa malire anu. Palibe ndi mmodzi yemwe adzafune kulanda dziko lanu ngati inu muzidzapita katatu pa chaka pamaso pa Yehova Mulungu wanu, chaka chilichonse.

25.verse: “Musapereke magazi anyama ngati nsembe kwa Ine pamodzi ndi chilichonse chimene chili ndi yisiti, ndipo musasunge nsembe ya pa Chikondwerero cha Paska mpaka mmawa.

26.verse: “Muzibwera ndi zipatso zoyambirira kucha zabwino kwambiri ku nyumba ya Yehova Mulungu wanu. “Musamaphike kamwana kambuzi mu mkaka wa mayi wake.”

27.verse: Kenaka Yehova anati kwa Mose, “Lemba mawu awa pakuti potsatira mawuwa, ine ndipangana pangano ndi iwe ndi Israeli.”

28.verse: Mose anakhala kumeneko pamodzi ndi Yehova masiku 40, usana ndi usiku, wosadya kanthu kapena kumwa madzi. Ndipo iye analemba pa miyala ija mawu a pangano, malamulo khumi.

29.verse: Nkhope ya Mose Inyezimira - Mose anatsika kuchokera mʼPhiri la Sinai pamodzi ndi miyala iwiri ija ya pangano mʼmanja mwake. Iye sanazindikire kuti nkhope yake imanyezimira pakuti anayankhula ndi Yehova.

30.verse: Aaroni ndi Aisraeli ataona kuti nkhope ya Mose imanyezimira anaopa kumuyandikira.

31.verse: Koma Mose anawayitana. Kotero Aaroni ndi atsogoleri onse a gululo anabwera kwa iye, ndipo anawayankhula.

32.verse: Kenaka Aisraeli onse anamuyandikira, ndipo anawapatsa malamulo onse omwe Yehova anamupatsa pa Phiri la Sinai.

33.verse: Mose atamaliza kuyankhula nawo anaphimba nkhope yake.

34.verse: Koma nthawi zonse popita pamaso pa Yehova kukayankhula naye amachotsa chophimbacho mpaka atatuluka. Ndipo akatuluka kudzawuza Aisraeli zimene walamulidwa,

35.verse: iwo amaona nkhope yake ikunyezimira. Choncho Mose amaphimba nkhope yake ngakhale pamene amapita kukayankhula ndi Yehova.

1.verse: Malamulo Osunga Sabata - Mose anasonkhanitsa gulu lonse la Aisraeli ndipo anawawuza kuti, “Zinthu zimene Yehova wakulamulirani kuti muzichite ndi izi:

2.verse: Muzigwira ntchito zanu pa masiku asanu ndi limodzi, koma tsiku la chisanu ndi chiwiri likhale la Sabata, tsiku lanu lopuma, lopatulika kwa Yehova. Aliyense amene adzagwira ntchito iliyonse pa tsikuli ayenera kuphedwa.

3.verse: Pa tsiku la Sabata musakoleze moto paliponse pamene mukhala.”

4.verse: Zopereka ku Malo Opatulika - Mose ananena kwa gulu lonse la Aisraeli kuti, “Zimene Yehova wakulamulirani ndi izi:

5.verse: Kuchokera pa zomwe muli nazo, mutenge chopereka cha Yehova. Aliyense amene ali ndi mtima wofuna kupereka abweretse kwa Yehova zopereka izi: Golide, siliva ndi mkuwa;

6.verse: nsalu zobiriwira, zapepo, zofiira, nsalu zofewa; ubweya wambuzi;

7.verse: zikopa za nkhosa zazimuna za utoto wofiira ndi zikopa za akatumbu; matabwa amtengo wa mkesha,

8.verse: mafuta anyale a olivi, zonunkhiritsa mafuta odzozera ndi zopangira lubani wonunkhira;

9.verse: miyala yokongola ya mtundu wa onikisi ndi ina yabwino yoyika pa Efodi ndi pa chovala cha pachifuwa.

10.verse: “Anthu onse aluso pakati panu abwere ndi kupanga zonse zimene Yehova walamula:

11.verse: Chihema ndi tenti yake ndiponso chophimba chake, ngowe zake, maferemu ake, mitanda yake, mizati yake ndi matsinde ake;

12.verse: Bokosi la Chipangano pamodzi ndi mitengo yake yonyamulira ndiponso chovundikira chake cha bokosilo ndi nsalu zophimba bokosilo;

13.verse: tebulo pamodzi ndi mitengo yake yonyamulira pamodzi ndi zipangizo zake zonse ndiponso buledi wokhala pamaso pa Yehova;

14.verse: choyikapo nyale yowunikira pamodzi ndi zipangizo zake, nyale ndi mafuta anyalezo;

15.verse: guwa lofukizira lubani pamodzi ndi mitengo yake yonyamulira, mafuta odzozera ndi lubani onunkhira; nsalu yotchinga pa khomo lolowera mʼchihema;

16.verse: guwa lansembe yopsereza pamodzi ndi sefa yamkuwa, mitengo yake yonyamulira ndi zipangizo zake zonse, beseni losambira lamkuwa ndi miyendo yake;

17.verse: nsalu yotchingira bwalo pamodzi ndi mizati yake ndi matsinde ake, ndiponso nsalu yotchingira pa khomo lolowera ku bwalo;

18.verse: zikhomo za tenti ya chihema ndiponso za bwalo, ndi zingwe zake;

19.verse: zovala zolukidwa zovala potumikira kumalo opatulika, zovala zopatulika za wansembe, Aaroni pamodzi ndi za ana ake aamuna pamene akutumikira monga ansembe.”

20.verse: Kenaka gulu lonse la Aisraeli linachoka pamaso pa Mose,

21.verse: ndipo aliyense amene anakhudzidwa mu mtima mwake nafuna kupereka, anabwera kudzapereka chopereka kwa Yehova cha ntchito yokonza tenti ya msonkhano, cha ntchito zonse za mʼtentimo ndi cha zovala zopatulika.

22.verse: Onse amene anali ndi mtima wofuna, amuna ndi amayi omwe anabwera kudzapereka zodzikometsera zagolide za mtundu uliwonse: zomangira zovala, ndolo, mphete ndi zokometsera. Onse anapereka golide wawo monga nsembe yoweyula pamaso pa Yehova.

23.verse: Aliyense amene anali ndi nsalu ya mtundu wa mtambo, yapepo kapena yofiira kapena yofewa, yosalala, kapena ubweya wambuzi, zikopa za nkhosa zonyika mu utoto wofiira kapena zikopa anazibweretsa.

24.verse: Onse amene anapereka chopereka cha siliva kapena mkuwa anabweretsa monga chopereka kwa Yehova. Ndipo aliyense amene anali ndi matabwa a mtengo wa mkesha kuti awagwiritse ntchito mbali ina iliyonse ya ntchitoyo, anabweretsa.

25.verse: Mayi aliyense waluso analuka ndi manja ake ndi kubweretsa chomwe analuka cha mtundu wa mtambo, chapepo kapena chofiira kapena chofewa, chosalala.

26.verse: Ndipo amayi onse amene anali ndi mtima wofuna ndipo anali ndi luso analuka ubweya wa mbuzi.

27.verse: Atsogoleri anabweretsa miyala ya onikisi ndi miyala yokongola yoyika pa efodi ndi chovala chapachifuwa.

28.verse: Anabweretsanso zonunkhiritsa ndiponso mafuta owunikira a olivi ndi odzozera ndi zofukizira zonunkhira.

29.verse: Aisraeli onse aamuna ndi aakazi amene anali ndi mtima wofuna, anabweretsa kwa Yehova chopereka chaufulu ku ntchito yonse ya Yehova imene analamulira kudzera mwa Mose kuti achite.

30.verse: Bezaleli ndi Oholiabu - Kenaka Mose anati kwa Aisraeli, “Taonani, Yehova wasankha Bezaleli mwana wa Uri, mwana wa Huri, wa fuko la Yuda,

31.verse: ndipo wamudzaza ndi Mzimu wa Mulungu kotero kuti ali ndi luso ndi nzeru zomvetsa zinthu, ndipo akudziwa bwino ntchito zonse zamanja monga izi:

32.verse: Kulemba ndondomeko ya ntchito zaluso ndi kupanga zinthu zagolide, zasiliva ndi zamkuwa,

33.verse: kusema ndi kuyika miyala yokongola, kukonza zinthu zamatabwa ndiponso kugwira ntchito ina iliyonse yamanja.

34.verse: Ndipo Iye wapereka kwa Bezaleli pamodzi ndi Oholiabu mwana wa Ahisamaki, wa fuko la Dani luso lophunzitsa ena.

35.verse: Mulungu wawapatsa maluso osiyanasiyana, maluso ogoba, olemba ndondomeko, opeta zokometsera pa nsalu zamtundu wamtambo, zapepo ndi zofiira ndiponso zofewa zosalala ndi zoluka. Onsewa ndi amisiri a ntchito zamanja ndi zokonza ndondomeko.

1.verse: Choncho Bezaleli, Oholiabu pamodzi ndi anthu aluso onse amene Yehova anawapatsa luso ndi nzeru zodziwira kupanga zofunika zonse zomangira malo opatulika, adzapanga zonse iwowo, monga momwe Yehova analamulira.”

2.verse: Ndipo Mose anayitana Bezaleli ndi Oholiabu ndiponso munthu aliyense waluso amene Yehova anamupatsa luso ndiponso amene anali ndi mtima wofuna kugwira ntchito.

3.verse: Iwo analandira kuchokera kwa Mose zopereka zonse Aisraeli anabweretsa kuti agwirire ntchito yomanga malo wopatulika. Ndipo anthu anapitirira kupereka zopereka zaufulu mmawa uliwonse.

4.verse: Kotero amisiri onse amene amagwira ntchito yonse ya malo wopatulika anasiya ntchitoyo

5.verse: ndipo anati kwa Mose, “Anthu akubweretsa kuposa zimene zikufunika kugwirira ntchito imene Yehova analamulira kuti ichitike.”

6.verse: Choncho Mose analamulira ndipo analengeza mu msasa onse, “Mwamuna kapena mayi aliyense asaperekenso chopereka chilichonse cha ku malo wopatulika.” Choncho anthu analetsedwa kubweretsa zambiri,

7.verse: chifukwa zimene anali nazo zinali zoposera zimene zimafunika kugwirira ntchito yonse.

8.verse: Chihema - Anthu onse aluso pakati pa anthu ogwira ntchitoyo anapanga chihema pogwiritsa ntchito nsalu khumi zofewa, zosalala ndi zolukidwa bwino, zobiriwira, zapepo ndi zofiira. Ndipo anthu aluso anapeta pa nsaluzo Akerubi.

9.verse: Nsalu zonse zinali zofanana. Mulitali mwake zinali mamita khumi ndi atatu, mulifupi mamita awiri.

10.verse: Iwo analumikiza nsalu zisanu, kuti ikhale nsalu imodzi ndipo anachita chimodzimodzi ndi nsalu zisanu zinazo.

11.verse: Kenaka anapanga zokolowekamo za nsalu yobiriwira mʼmphepete mwa nsalu imodzi yotsiriza ya mbali ina. Ndipo anachita chimodzimodzi ndi nsalu yotsiriza ya mbali inayo.

12.verse: Iwo anasokerera zokolowekamo makumi asanu pa nsalu yoyamba ndi zokolowekamo makumi asanu zinanso pa nsalu inayo. Anapanga kuti zokolowekamozo ziziyangʼanana.

13.verse: Kenaka anapanga ngowe zagolide 50 zolumikizira nsalu ziwirizo kotero kuti zinapanga chihema chimodzi.

14.verse: Iwo anapanga nsalu za ubweya wambuzi zophimba pamwamba pa chihemacho. Nsalu zonse pamodzi zinalipo khumi ndi imodzi.

15.verse: Nsalu zonse khumi ndi imodzi zinali zofanana. Mulitali mwake munali mamita khumi ndi anayi ndipo mulifupi mwake munali mamita awiri.

16.verse: Iwo analumikiza nsalu zisanu kukhala nsalu imodzi ndipo nsalu zinazo zisanu ndi imodzi, analumikizanso kukhala nsalu imodzinso.

17.verse: Kenaka anasokerera zokolowekamo makumi asanu mʼmphepete mwa nsalu imodzi yotsirizira ya nsalu yoyamba yolumikiza ija ndiponso anapanga zokolowekamo zina makumi asanu mʼmphepete mwa nsalu yotsirizira ya nsalu inanso yolumikiza ija.

18.verse: Iwo anapanga ngowe 50 zamkuwa zolowetsa mu zokolowekazo ndipo anaphatikiza nsalu ziwirizo kuti tentiyo ikhale imodzi.

19.verse: Ndipo anapanga chikopa cha nkhosa zazimuna cha utoto wofiira chophimbira tentiyo ndipo pamwamba pake anapanganso chophimbira china cha zikopa za akatumbu.

20.verse: Iwo anapanga maferemu amatabwa amtengo wa mkesha oyimikira chihemacho.

21.verse: Feremu iliyonse inali yotalika mamita anayi ndipo mulifupi mwake munali masentimita 69.

22.verse: Thabwa lililonse linali ndi zolumikizira ziwiri. Iwo anapanga maferemu onse a chihemacho ndi matabwa otere.

23.verse: Anapanga maferemu makumi awiri a mbali yakummwera kwa chihemacho,

24.verse: ndiponso anapanga matsinde 40 asiliva ndipo anawayika pansi pa maferemuwo. Pansi pa feremu iliyonse anayika matsinde awiri ogwiriziza zolumikizira ziwiri zija.

25.verse: Iwo anapanganso maferemu makumi awiri a mbali yakumpoto ya chihemacho,

26.verse: ndiponso matsinde makumi anayi asiliva, awiri pansi pa feremu iliyonse.

27.verse: Anapanganso maferemu asanu ndi imodzi a kumbuyo kwa tenti, kumbali yakumadzulo,

28.verse: ndiponso maferemu awiri a pa ngodya yakumbuyo kwenikweni kwa tenti.

29.verse: Pa ngodya ziwirizi panali maferemu awiri, kuyambira pansi mpaka pamwamba atalumikizidwa pa ngowe imodzi. Maferemu onse anali ofanana.

30.verse: Choncho panali maferemu asanu ndi atatu ndiponso matsinde 16 asiliva, awiri anali pansi pa feremu iliyonse.

31.verse: Iwo anapanganso mitanda ya matabwa amtengo wa mkesha. Mitanda isanu inali ya maferemu a mbali imodzi ya chihema,

32.verse: mitanda isanu inanso inali ya maferemu a mbali inayo ndipo mitanda ina isanu ya mbali yakumadzulo, kumapeto kwenikweni kwa chihema.

33.verse: Anapanga mtanda wapakati omwe umachokera pa maferemu a mbali ina mpaka mbali inanso.

34.verse: Iwo anakuta maferemuwo ndi golide ndiponso anapanga mphete zagolide zogwiriziza mitandayo. Ndipo mitandayonso anayikuta ndi golide.

35.verse: Anapanga nsalu yokhala ndi mtundu wamtambo, wapepo ndi ofiira ndipo nsaluyo inali yolukidwa bwino, yofewa ndi yosalala. Ndipo anthu aluso anapetapo zithunzi za Akerubi.

36.verse: Iwo anapanga nsanamira zinayi zamtengo wa mkesha zokutidwa ndi golide. Anapanganso ngowe zagolide za nsanamirazo ndi matsinde asiliva anayi.

37.verse: Anapanga nsalu ya pa chipata cholowera mu chihema, yamtundu wamtambo, wapepo ndi ofiira yomwe inali yofewa ndi yosalala, yopetedwa bwino ndi amisiri aluso.

38.verse: Anapanga nsanamira zisanu ndi ngowe zake. Anakuta pamwamba pa nsanamirazo ndi zomangira zake ndi golide, ndipo anapanganso matsinde asanu amkuwa.

1.verse: Bokosi la Chipangano - Bezaleli anapanga Bokosi la Chipangano lamatabwa amtengo wa mkesha. Kutalika kwake kunali masentimita 114, mulifupi mwake munali masentimita 69, msinkhu wake masentimita 69.

2.verse: Iye analikuta bokosilo ndi golide wabwino kwambiri mʼkati mwake ndi kunja komwe. Anapanganso mkombero wagolide kuzungulira bokosilo.

3.verse: Iye anapanga mphete zinayi zagolide ndi kuzimangirira ku miyendo yake inayi ija, mbali ina ziwiri ndi mbali inanso ziwiri.

4.verse: Kenaka anapanga mizati yamtengo wa mkesha ndi kuzikuta ndi golide.

5.verse: Ndipo analowetsa nsichizo mʼmphete zija za mbali zonse ziwiri za bokosilo kuti azinyamulira.

6.verse: Iye anapanga chivundikiro cha bokosilo cha golide wabwino kwambiri, kutalika kwake masentimita 114, mulifupi mwake masentimita 69.

7.verse: Ndipo anapanga Akerubi awiri agolide osula ndi nyundo ndi kuwayika mbali ziwiri za chivundikirocho.

8.verse: Iye anapanga kerubi mmodzi mbali ina ndi wina mbali inayo. Akerubiwa anawapangira limodzi ndi chivundikirocho mʼmapeto mwa mbali ziwirizo.

9.verse: Mapiko a Akerubiwo anatambasukira pamwamba pa chivundikiro cha bokosilo kuti achiphimbe. Akerubiwo anakhala choyangʼanana, aliyense kuyangʼana chivundikirocho.

10.verse: Mapangidwe a Tebulo - Iwo anapanga tebulo la matabwa amtengo wa mkesha, mulitali mwake masentimita 91, mulifupi mwake masentimita 46, msinkhu wake masentimita 69.

11.verse: Kenaka analikuta ndi golide wabwino kwambiri, ndipo anapanga mkombero wagolide mʼmbali mwake.

12.verse: Iwo anapanga feremu yozungulira tebulo, mulifupi mwake ngati chikhatho cha dzanja, ndipo anayika mkombero wagolide kuzungulira feremuyo.

13.verse: Iwo anapanga mphete zinayi zagolide ndipo anazilumikiza ku ngodya zake zinayi, kumene kunali miyendo yake inayi.

14.verse: Mphetezo anaziyika kufupi ndi feremu kuti azikolowekamo nsichi zonyamulira tebuloyo.

15.verse: Anapanga nsichi zamtengo wa mkesha ndi kuzikuta ndi golide kuti azinyamulira tebulolo.

16.verse: Ndipo anapanga ziwiya za pa tebulolo zagolide wabwino, mbale ndi zipande, mitsuko ndi mabeseni zogwiritsa ntchito popereka nsembe za chakumwa.

17.verse: Mapangidwe a Choyikapo Nyale - Iwo anapanga choyikapo nyale chagolide wabwino kwambiri. Tsinde lake ndi mphanda zake zinasulidwa ndi nyundo. Zikho zake zokhala ndi mphukira ndi maluwa ake zinapangidwa kumodzi.

18.verse: Mʼmbali mwake munali mphanda zisanu ndi imodzi, zitatu mbali iliyonse.

19.verse: Zikho zitatu zokhala ngati za maluwa amtowo, mphukira ndi duwa zinali pa mphanda yoyamba. Pa mphanda yachiwiri panalinso zikho zitatu zokhala ngati za maluwa amtowo, mphukira ndi duwa. Ndipo mphanda zonse zisanu ndi imodzi zinali chimodzimodzi ndipo zinatuluka mʼchoyikapo nyalecho.
